# language_name:        Suau
# closest ISO 639-3:    swp
# ISO_15924:            Latn
# year_short:           1998
# year_long:            
# vernacular_title:     RIBA HARIHARIUNA. Buk Stat, Josua, Buk Song, na Nupela Testamen long tokples Suau long Niugini
# english_title:        Genesis, Joshua, Psalms,and The New Testament in the Suau language of Papua New Guinea

# notes:                
01001001	Bagubagunana eai Eaubada galewa eo tanoubu i hetubudi .
01001002	Tanoubu nige ana ao , eo aha’ahana , eo gabogabo potana eai masigiri mo ; na Eaubada Earuana gabogabo wa i moimoiutawaidi .
01001003	Na Eaubada i ene , “ Bena i mara ; ” to ie mara .
01001004	Eaubada mara wa ie ita i lolo ; eo Eaubada masigiri arinai mara wa i torehesuara .
01001005	Marana wa Eaubada esana ie tore Asubena , eo masigiri wa esana ie tore Maiona . Abo maimailahi , eo maratomtom , asubena bagubagunana .
01001006	Abo Eaubada i ene , “ Galewa tehana abo goila duaduaridi eai , abo goila i soiedi . ”
01001007	To galewa tehana wa Eaubada i ginauri , eo goila tehana wa ubuna eai eo tehana wa ewana eai i tore udoiedi . Hinage doha , ie tubu .
01001008	Eo Eaubada tehana wa esana ie tore Galewa . Abo maimailahi , eo maratomtom asubena helabuina .
01001009	Abo Eaubada i ene , “ Bena goila galewa ubuna eai i abigogoi ena aba’ota esega , bena tano pitapitarina i taumasaraha . ” Hinage doha , ie tubu .
01001010	Eaubada tano pitapitarina wa esana ie tore Tanoubu , eo goila se he’esegaidi wa esadi ie tore Gabogabo . Eo Eaubada ie ita i lolo .
01001011	Abo Eaubada i ene , “ Bena tano ginauri ini’inidi se ini , ma tumadi , eo uaua oeagidi , uauadi se toredi boeadi eai tumadi , esa , esa ano ao i lauwatai tano potana eai . ” Hinage doha , ie tubu .
01001012	Tano ginauri ini’indi i he’inidi , ma tumadi adi ao udoi udoi eai , eo oeagi uauadi se toredi , uauadi wa ma tumadi , adi ao udoi udoi se lauwataidi . Eo Eaubada ie ita i lolo .
01001013	Abo maimailahi , eo maratomtom , asubena hehaionana .
01001014	Abo Eaubada i ene , “ Galewa tehana eai bena maradi , asubena eo maiona aba‐abi’udoiedi ; isi abo heiheinoi , eo huia aba‐nonoidi , asubena eo borimai .
01001015	Eo wau maradi wa galewa tehana eai abo hinage tanoubu se hemara . ” Hinage doha , ie tubu .
01001016	Eo Eaubada mara lailaidi labui i hetubudi , lailai aririna bena asubena i tanuagai , mara gagirina bena maiona i tanuagai ; ipora hinage i ginauridi .
01001017	Eaubada i toredi galewa tehana eai bena tanoubu se hemara ,
01001018	eo bena asubena eo maiona se tanuagaidi , eo bena mara eo masigiri se soiedi . Eo Eaubada ie ita i lolo .
01001019	Abo maimailahi , eo maratomtom , asubena hehasina .
01001020	Eaubada i ene , “ Bena gabogabo ginauri maumauridi eawoidi i hetubudi , eo manu tano ewana eai se loiloiusi galewa tehana eai . ”
01001021	Arinai ede Eaubada gabogabo ginauridi lailai didigadi i hetubudi , eo ginauri maumauridi tau moimoiu maudoidi , gabogabo eai taumia , adi ao udoi udoi eai , eo manu mabedi gamagaridi , adi ao udoi udoi eai . Eo Eaubada ie ita i lolo .
01001022	Eo Eaubada i ribahelolodi , i ene , “ Au ua , au hegamagarimiu gabogabo goiladi au hemonaudi , manu hinage tano potana eai bena se gamagari . ”
01001023	Abo maimailahi , eo maratomtom asubena hehaligigina .
01001024	Eaubada i ene , “ Bena tano ginauri maumauridi adi ao udoi udoi eai i hetubudi ; bulumakau ginauri se daladalausi , suisui udoi udoi adi ao udoi udoi eai . ” Hinage doha , ie tubu .
01001025	Eaubada tano suisuidi i hetubudi , adi ao udoi udoi eai , eo bulumakau adi ao udoi udoi eai , eo ginauri maudoidi tano eai se daladalausi esa esa ana ao eai . Eo Eaubada ie ita i lolo .
01001026	Abotai Eaubada i ene , “ Bena tau ta hetubu tautauda eai , eo ada ao eai ; eo isi bena gabogabo eamadi se tanuagaidi , eo eada manudi , eo bulumakau , eo tano maudoina , eo ginauri gamagaridi tano eai tau‐daladalausi . ”
01001027	Arinai ede Eaubada tau i hetubu iabom tautauna eai tau i hetubu , tau eo sine i hetubudi .
01001028	Eo Eaubada i ribahelolodi , eo Eaubada i ribalau aridi eai i ene , “ Au ua , au hegamagarimiu , tanoubu au hemonau eo tanoubu tanuagaina eai au lau ; gabogabo eamadi hinage au tanuagaidi , eada manudi hinage eo ginauri maumauridi gamagaridi isi ede tano potana eai se moimoiu . ”
01001029	Eo Eaubada i ene , “ Au ita , ginauri ini’inidi gamagaridi tuma se hetuhetubudi , tanoubu maudoina potana eai , isi ede ea lediwa’o , oeagi gamagaridi hinage uauadi eai tumadi ; abo au abidi ami aiai .
01001030	Eo tano suisuidi gamagaridi , eo eada manudi eo ginauri gamagaridi tano eai taudala , ginauri maudoidi aridi eai mauri eahuana aridi eai hinage ginauri in’inidi ea mosedi’o adi aiai . ” Hinage doha , ie tubu .
01001031	Abo Eaubada ginauri gamagaridi i hetubudi wa ie italau aridi eai , ie ita , se lolo ariri . Abo maimailahi eo maratomtom , asubena hehaligigi‐esegana .
01002001	Doha ina galewa eo tanoubu se heohidi , ginauridi maudoudoidi .
01002002	Na asubena hehaligigi‐labuina eai Eaubada paisoa i paisoaei wa , i heohi , arinai asubena hehaligigi‐labuina eai ana paisoa gamagaridi wa i aiyawasiedi .
01002003	Arinai Eaubada asubena hehaligigi‐labuina i ainauiai eo i hetabuei , paana arinai Eaubada ana paisoa wa i aiyawasiei , ena hetuhetubu paisoana wa .
01002004	Galewa eo tanoubu huia hetubudi wasadi . Asubena eai ne GUIAU Eaubada tanoubu eo galewa i ginauridi .
01002005	Huiana ne sora nige oea ginaurina ini’inina esau tano eai i tubu , eo sora nige oea lagauna i inisaema , paana GUIAU Eaubada sora nige nabu i hetaru tano eai , eo sora nige tau esau tano i giari ;
01002006	na goura mo tano eai ie sae , iaede tano maudoina i hebuta .
01002007	Abotai GUIAU Eaubada tau i hetubu tanoubu muamuana eai , mauri eahuana i eahualau isuna eai ; abo tau wa i hemala doga ma earuana maumaurina .
01002008	Abo GUIAU Eaubada oea i umai Edena eai , tupo aruabu eai , temetai abo tau wa ie tore , iaede i ginauri wa .
01002009	Eo tano eai GUIAU Eaubada oeagi gamagaridi i hetubudi , isi ede adi ao se lolo , eo isi hinage aiaidi se lolo ; mauri oeagina hinage oea duaduarina eai , eo lolo eo baaea italobaina oeagina hinage .
01002010	Saga esau Edena eai i didipesa , oea wa ana goila , abo i hemala saga hasi .
01002011	Bagubagunana esana Pisona ; ia ede i lau Havila tehana maudoina i hetaiiri , temetai wa ;
01002012	eanua ne ena i lolo dumaduma ; eo we’una hinage metai .
01002013	Saga helabuina esana Gihona ; ia ede Kusa oeana maudoina i tauhetaiiri .
01002014	Hehaionana esana ede Hidekela , Asiria tupo aruabuna eai ie lau . Eo saga hehasina ede Euparatea .
01002015	GUIAU Eaubada tau wa ie abi ie tore Edena oeana eai , bena i giari eo i itawatai .
01002016	GUIAU Eaubada tau wa i lauhesom , i ene , “ Oea ta oeagina gamagaridi uauadi abo au ainapaidi ;
01002017	na lolo eo baaea italobaina oeagina iabom mo taba nige au ai , nei asubenana eai ne au ai abo au mate . ”
01002018	Abo GUIAU Eaubada i ene , “ Nige i lolo tau iabom mo i mia ; ana sagu abo ea ginauri abo i lau loloei . ”
01002019	Arinai tano eai GUIAU Eaubada oea suisuidi gamagaridi , eo eada manudi gamagaridi i hetubudi , eo i woeaidima Adamu arinai , ia bena esadi i toredi , eo Adamu wa esa saha i mosedi ginauri maumauridi gamagaridi eai , isi esadi ede .
01002020	Adamu esa i mosedi suisui gamagaridi oea eai taumia ; na Adamu iabom sora nige ana sagu mamohoina se lobai .
01002021	Arinai GUIAU Eaubada Adamu i heenomate , ia ma eno‐matena oitarina esau i abihai eo bulumana i hemauuioi ;
01002022	eo wau oitarina wa GUIAU Eaubada tau lisilisina eai i niusihai wa , arinai sine i ginauri , eo i woeaiyama tau arinai .
01002023	Abo Adamu i ene , “ Teina abotai ede siadagu siadana , eo bulumagu bulumana ; ia esana abo se atai Sine , paana tau arinai se abihaiyama . ”
01002024	Arinai ede tau tamana eo sinana abo i laugabaedi i patudidini monena arinai , eo isi se hemala bulumadi esega .
01002025	Wau tau wa ma monena isi taudi labui ma kohakohadi , na nige se taumaeamaea .
01003001	Nuura suisuidi GUIAU Eaubada i hetubudi wa , boeadi eai mota iabom i sonoga ariri . I ribalau sine arinai i ene , “ Eaubada i ene taba nige oea ta oeagina uauadi au aidi , wa ? ”
01003002	Sine i ribalau mota arinai i ene , “ Oea ta oeagina uauadi taba ai aidi ,
01003003	na Eaubada i ribaei mo i ene , ‘ Oeagi wa oea duaduarina eai i totoro , temeta mo uauana taba nige au ai , hinage taba nige au abilau arinai , ata au mate ’ . ”
01003004	Mota abo i ribalau sine arinai i ene , “ Mamohoi taba nige au mate ;
01003005	Eaubada abina i ata huiana eai ena omi au ai abo matamiu se lala , abo omi doha Eaubada , lolo eo baaea italobaina abo au italobai . ”
01003006	Arinai sine wa ie ita oeagi wa uauana omihede i lolo , ana ao matana eai i lolo , oeagi gadolelehina , paana tau arinai i sibasiba , abo i abilau uauana arinai , to ie ai ; tupona i mosei monena arinai ia hinage ie ai .
01003007	Abotai abo tataodi labui se matalala , se italobaiuioidi hede ma kohakohadi . Abo kuhou lugudi se bodigogoidi , edi nogi se ginauridi .
01003008	Abo GUIAU Eaubada dagudaguguna se ataiei , oea eai wa i laulauwaiyo maimailahi wayawayauna eai , Adamu ma monena GUIAU Eaubada matana eai se bawayamui oea wa oeagina boeadi eai .
01003009	Na GUIAU Eaubada i eogalau Adamu arinai i ene , “ Oa ede haedi ? ”
01003010	Ia abo i heuioi i ene , “ Dagugum ea ataiei oea eai , na ea matausi paana ma kohakohagu ina , arinai ea bawayamui . ”
01003011	Ia i ene , “ Eai i heribam u kohakoha ? Oeagi uauana ue ai , wa , iaede ea gorai bena tabu u ai ? ”
01003012	Tau wa i ene , “ Sine u leama ia bena maegu wa , ia oeagi wa uauana i leama , to ea ai . ”
01003013	GUIAU Eaubada sine wa arinai ie riba , i ene : “ Saha ina u ginauri ta ? ” Sine i ene , “ Mota i boraigu , to ea ai . ”
01003014	GUIAU Eaubada mota arinai ie riba , i ene ; “ Paana teina oa u ginauri , ea ribahematem ta suisui gamagaridi eo suisui manamanabaradi boeadi eai ; bogam eai abo u nenene , tano muamuana abo u ai , em mauri asubenadi gamagaridi eai .
01003015	Hewaiununa abo ea tore oa eo sine duaduarimiu eai , eo oa tumamyao eo sine tumanayao duaduaridi eai hinage ; ia abo urum i utuhegaro , eo oa abo ae gedurina u oihegaro . ”
01003016	Sine arinai i ene , “ Abi‐merumeru arinai abo em amamna ea hegamagari ; amamna boeadi eai abo nanatumyao u labasidi , taiede , em gadosisi abo otana mo monem arinai , ia hinage abo i tanuagaim . ”
01003017	Adamu arinai i ene , “ Paana monem arinana u ataiei , eo oeagi wa ue ai , ea lauhesom wa , ‘ Tabu u ai , ’ tano ea ribahebaaea ta debam eai ; paisoa amamnana mo abo aiaina u ai em mauri asubenadi gamagaridi eai ;
01003018	nurinuri eo lagau baabaaeadi abo i he’inidiwa ; eo oea wa aiaidi se ini iaede abo au aidi .
01003019	Debam muiasana eai aiai abo u ai , i lau e u uio tano arinai , ede tano eai se hetubum wa ; oa tano ede , arinai abo u hemalatanouio . ”
01003020	Adamu monena esana ie tore Eva paana ginauri maumauridi gamagaridi ia sinadi ede .
01003021	GUIAU Eaubada Adamu ma monena adi lulu suisui opidi eai i ginauridi , eo i heluidi .
01003022	Abo GUIAU Eaubada i ene , “ Paana tau i hemala doha ita esau , lolo eo baaea italobaina i italobaiyao , ata nimana i helele mauri oeagina uauana hinage i ai , abo maurina i lau esegai e nige nosina . ”
01003023	Arinai GUIAU Eaubada Edena oeana eai i hepesa , i hetamari bena wau tano arinai ia se hetubu wa i giari .
01003024	Arinai tau wa i aiduiei ; to oeana tupo aruabu eai serubim esau i hetoro , eo elepa balebalelemna i he’ode tupo gamagari eai , mauri oeagina dobilana wa i taugudui .
01004001	Adamu monena Eva i nuatui , to ie boga abo Kaina i labasi , i ene , “ Tau esau GUIAU arinai ea aabi . ”
01004002	Abotai hinage ia ena tau Abela i labasi . Abela abo i hemala mamoe tauitawataina esau , na Kaina ia tano taugiarina .
01004003	Huiana abo ie lage , Kaina oea uauana i leama GUIAU arinai , ena ainauia .
01004004	Na Abela ena mamoe eawoina natu‐ealahoudi , tubutubu‐lolodi i ledima . GUIAU Abela ena ainauia i heasisiei ,
01004005	na Kaina eo ena ainauia nige i nualoloedi . Arinai Kaina i ouyalayala ariri , eo ana ao i hebaaea .
01004006	GUIAU i ribalau Kaina arinai i ene , “ Paana saha u ouyalayala , eo paana saha am ao u hebaaea ?
01004007	Ena em abi se dudurai , abo se nualoloem , e nige’e ? Ena em abi nige se dudurai , baaea dobila eai i wesewesem , ena gadosisi bena i abim , na oa mo bena u saepoini . ”
01004008	Kaina i ribalau ena tau Abela arinai i ene , “ U laoma ta lau oea eai . ” Isi taudi labui se lage’o oea eai abo Kaina i toro ena tau Abela i lului abo i eatu’nui .
01004009	GUIAU abo i ribalau Kaina arinai ie ene , “ Em tau Abela wa ia haedi ? ” I heuio i ene , “ Ibai : bena eau egu tau tauitawataina wa ? ”
01004010	GUIAU i ene , “ Saha ue abi ina ? Em tau osinana arinana tano eai i dou‐saema arigu eai .
01004011	Tano wa awana i dabari em tau osinana oa nimam eai ie abi ia ede i ribahematem ta .
01004012	Oa tano abo u giari , iamo adidirina taba nige i leawa’uioi ; oa abo taudago eo tauelitata tanoubu eai ta . ”
01004013	Kaina abo i ribalau GUIAU arinai i ene , “ Egu maisa i lai ariri , nige gonoana ea bahei .
01004014	U ita , wau tano eai ta u aiduiegu ; oa matam eai hinage abo ea tauyamui ; eau abo taudago eo tauelitata tanoubu eai ta , ena esau i lobaigu abo i unuigu . ”
01004015	Abo GUIAU arinai ie riba i ene , “ Taba nige’e ! Ena taba esau Kaina i unuhemate , ana gum abo i hearo , ma haligigi‐labui . ” Abo GUIAU heiheinoina ie tore Kaina arinai , ata tau esau i lobai abo i unui .
01004016	Kaina GUIAU matana abo i laugabaei , ia abo Nodi oeana eai ie mia , Edena teha aruabu eai .
01004017	Kaina ia monena i nuatui , ia abo ie boga , to Enoka i labasi ; abo eanua lailai i hetubu , eanua wa natuna esana i mosei , Enoka .
01004018	Enoka arinai Irada se labasi ; Irada ia Mehuiaele tamana ; Mehuiaele ia Metusaela tamana , eo Metusaela ie Lameka tamana .
01004019	Lameka monenayao labui ; esau esana Ada , eo esau Silaha .
01004020	Ada Iabala i labasi , ia numa‐lulu taumia eo bulumakau tauitawata tamadi ede .
01004021	Ena tau esana Iubala ; ia huelele tauoi eo baubau tauyuhi tataodi tamadi ede .
01004022	Silaha abo Tubala‐kaina i labasi ; ia ena aba‐paisoa poasi , eo tauginaurina . Tubala‐kaina louna ede Naama .
01004023	Lameka i ribalau monenayao aridi eai , “ Ada eo Silaha e , arinagu ta au ataiei , Omi Lameka monenayao e , hage egu riba au ataiei : tau esau ea eatu’nui paana agu gai ie tore , hewari esau paana i talaigu :
01004024	ena Kaina ana gum abo ma haligigi‐labui , mamohoi Lameka enana ma tatao‐haiona‐se‐mate‐sau‐doudoi‐haligigi‐labui ! ”
01004025	Abo Adamu monena i nuatuiuioi , to natuna i labasi esana ie tore Seta , i ene , “ Eaubada natugu esau i tauribaei enagu , Abela Kaina i unui wa helaudamaina . ”
01004026	Seta hinage natuna tau se labasi ia esana Inosi . Meta huia eai ne tatao se hetubu GUIAU esana se atai .
01005001	Adamu isina bukana ede ina . Huia ne Eaubada tau i hetubu , Eaubada ana ao eai ia i hetubu .
01005002	I hetubudi tau eo sine , eo i ainauiaidi , esadi i mosedi Tau , huiana i hetubudi wa .
01005003	Adamu ia borimai handere esega , eo tau‐esega‐i‐mate‐saudoudoi , abo i hemala tama , natuna iabom ana ao eai , eo ia tautauna eai , esana wa ie tore Seta .
01005004	Adamu asubenana , huia ne i hemala tama wa murina eai ede borimai handere haligigi‐haiona ; nanatunayaao headi tatao eo sisine hinage i labasidi .
01005005	Arinai Adamu ena mauri asubenadi maudoidi ede borimai handere haligigi‐hasi eo tau‐esega‐i‐mate‐saudoudoi ; abotai ie mate .
01005006	Seta ie mia borimai handere esega eo haligigi , muridi eai abo i hemala Inosi tamana .
01005007	Inosi se labasi wa murina eai Seta ie mia borimai handere haligigi‐haiona eo haligigi‐labui ; ia nanatunayao headi tatao eo sisine i abidi hinage .
01005008	Arinai Seta ena mauri asubenadi maudoidi ede borimai handere haligigi‐hasi eo saudoudoi‐labui . Abotai ie mate .
01005009	Inosi ie mia wa borimai tatao‐hasi‐se‐mate‐saudoudoi , abotai i hemala Kenana tamana .
01005010	Kenana se labasi wa murina eai Inosi borimai handere haligigi‐haiona eo saudoudoi‐haligigi ie mia , eo nanatunayao headi tatao eo sisine ie abidi hinage .
01005011	Arinai Inosi ena mauri asubenadi maudoidi ede handere haligigi‐hasi eo haligigi ; abotai ie mate .
01005012	Kenana ie mia borimaina tatao‐haiona‐se‐mate‐saudoudoi , abo i hemala Mahalalela tamana .
01005013	Mahalalela se labasi murina eai Kenana ie mia borimai handere haligigi‐haiona eo tatao‐labui‐se‐mate , eo nanatunayao tatao eo sisine headi i abidi .
01005014	Arinai Kenana ena mauri asubenadi maudoidi ede borimai handere haligigi‐hasi eo saudoudoi ; abotai ie mate .
01005015	Mahalalela ie mia borimaina tatao‐haiona‐se‐matehaligigi , abo i hemala Iareda tamana .
01005016	Iareda se labasi wa murina eai Mahalalela borimai handere haligigi‐haiona eo tau‐esega‐i‐mate‐saudoudoi , eo nanatunayao tatao eo sisine headi i abidi .
01005017	Arinai Mahalalela ena mauri asubenadi maudoidi ede borimai handere haligigi‐haiona eo tatao‐hasi‐se‐mate‐saudoudoihaligigi ; abotai abo ie mate .
01005018	Iareda borimai handere esega eo tatao‐haiona‐se‐mate eo labui ie mia , abo i hemala Enoka tamana !
01005019	Enoka se labasi wa murina eai Iareda borimai handere haligigi‐haiona ie mia , eo nanatunayao tatao eo sisine headi i abidi hinage .
01005020	Arinai Iareda ena mauri asubenadi ede borimai handere haligigi‐hasi eo tatao‐haiona‐se‐mate eo labui ; abotai ie mate .
01005021	Enoka borimai tatao‐haiona‐se‐mate eo haligigi ie mia , abo i hemala Metusela tamana .
01005022	Metusela se labasi wa murina eai Enoka Eaubada maena se laulau borimai handerehaiona , eo nanatunayao tatao eo sinine headi i abidi .
01005023	Arinai Enoka ena mauri asubenadi maudoidi ede borimai handere haiona eo tatao‐haiona‐se‐mate eo haligigi .
01005024	Enoka Eaubada maena se laulau esega , i lau e ia nige’e , paana Eaubada ia i abiya’o .
01005025	Metusela ie mia borimaina handere esega , eo tatao‐hasi‐se‐mate haligigi‐labui , abo i hemala Lameka tamana .
01005026	Lameka se labasi wa murina eai Metusela ie mia borimai handere haligigi‐labui eo tatao‐hasi‐se‐mate eo labui , eo nanatunayao tatao eo sisine headi i abidi .
01005027	Arinai Metusela ena mauri asubenadi maudoidi ede borimai handere haligigi‐hasi eo tatao‐haiona‐se‐mate eo haligigi‐hasi ; abo ie mate .
01005028	Lameka borimai handere esega eo tatao‐hasi‐se‐mate eo labui ie mia , natuna tau esau se labasi .
01005029	To esana wa ie tore Noa , i ene , “ Tano GUIAU i ribahemate wa boeana eai te ina ta abo aba‐aiyawasina i leama , ada paisoa arinai eo nimada edi paipaisoa aridi eai . ”
01005030	Noa se labasi wa murina eai Lameka ie mia borimaina handere haligigi eo tatao‐hasi‐semate‐saudoudoi‐haligigi , eo nanatunayao headi , tatao eo sisine i abidi .
01005031	Arinai Lameka ena mauri asubenadi maudoidi ede borimai handere haligigi‐labui eo tatao‐haiona‐se‐mate‐sau‐doudoi‐haligigi‐labui ; abo ie mate .
01005032	Noa borimai handere haligigi ie mia , abo i hemala Sema , Hama eo Iapeta tamadi .
01006001	Tatao se hetubu se gamagari ariri tanoubu potana eai , eo nanatudiyao sisine se labasidi ,
01006002	abo Eaubada nanatunayao tatao se italau sisine wa aridi eai tatao nanatudiyao se itadi adi ao se lolo ; abo headi se abidi monediyao , esa esa ena hinehineri eai .
01006003	Abo GUIAU i ene , “ Earuagu taba nige i haiabi da’oi tau nuana eai , ia buluma , ena asubena abo se lau borimai handere esega eo tau‐esega‐i‐mate . ”
01006004	Tatao lailaidi tanoubu eai ma miadi nei asubenadi eai ne , huia ne murina eai hinage , Eaubada nanatunayao wa , huia eai ne se laulau tatao nanatudiyao sisine aridi eai , isi abo nanatudiyao se labasidi . Teina tatao ta tatao adiadidiridi ede mumuga eai , eo tatao wasadi se lai .
01006005	GUIAU tau ena abi baaea tanoubu eai ie ita i lai ariri , eo nuaboeana eai ena itaitasipo eo ena nuanuatu se baaea mo , huia gamagari ,
01006006	GUIAU tau i hetubu tanoubu eai wa i nuadubuei , eo nuana i heamamna aririei .
01006007	Abo GUIAU i ene , “ Tau ea hetubu wa abo ea saugabaei tanoubu potana eai , tau eo suisui eo ginauri se daladalausi eo malagaibu manudi , hede nuagu i baaea ea hetubudi wa . ”
01006008	Na GUIAU matana eai Noa iabom arinai i nualoloei .
01006009	Noa wa isina ede ina . Noa tau laulau duduraina , isina boeana eai iabom nige giruna ; Noa maena Eaubada se laulau esega .
01006010	Eo Noa nanatunayao haiona , Sema , Hama eo Iapeta .
01006011	Tanoubu Eaubada matana eai i posa ariri , eo manamanabara i monau .
01006012	Eaubada tanoubu ie ita , hede ie posa , paana buluma gamagari edi dobila se hebaaea’o tanoubu eai .
01006013	Abo Eaubada Noa arinai ie riba , i ene , “ Nuagu bena buluma gamagari ea helautomdi ; paana isi debadi eai manamanabara tanoubu i monau ; besi , maedi tanoubu abo ea hebaaeadi .
01006014	Oa bena ake enam u ginauri , gopa oeagina eai , aroarona u biliutu’utusidi , murimurina eai eo arona eai arinai u aibadini .
01006015	Teina doha abo em abiabina ; ake wa lohana bena kubita handere haiona ; magagana bena kubita tatao‐labui‐se‐mate‐saudoudoi , eo dedeana saena kubita tau‐esega‐i‐mate saudoudoi .
01006016	Atohina eai tomlapaina abo u ginauri , kubita esega ewana eai u heohi ; ake dedeana eai abo gudana u tore ; eo matuna esau ubu eai , ewana eai isi helabuina eo hehaionana .
01006017	Paana u ita , eau abo dibori utu’utu lailaididigana ea leama tanoubu eai ta , buluma maudoina arinai abo ea hebaaeadi , saha eo saha mauri eawasina aridi eai , galewa ubuna eai , ginauri gamagari tanoubu potana eai abo se mate .
01006018	Na oa mo arim eai egu aigora abo ea hetoro ; oa abo u awasaema ake arona eai , oa eo nanatumyao tatao wa , eo monem , eo nanatumyao monediyao maemyao .
01006019	Eo ginauri maumauridi , buluma udoi udoi , labui to labui abo u ledima ake arona eai , maemyao au mauri , isi abo tamoana eo bawesina .
01006020	Manudi hinage , adi ao udoi udoi eai , suisui adi ao udoi udoi eai , lie udoi udoi , labui to labui , abo u heawasedima , mauridi bena u sogohidi .
01006021	Aiai udoi udoi se aiaidi , hinage adi . ”
01006022	Noa teina i ginauri ; riba maudoina Eaubada i ribahasahasai wa , i ginauri heohidi .
01007001	Abotai GUIAU i ribalau Noa arinai i ene , “ U awasae ake arona eai , oa eo maem numa taumia gamagaridi , paana ea itam’o oa tau abidudurai matagu eai , teina isi ta boeana eai .
01007002	Suisui aadi wa abo haligigi‐labui , hari ao , hari ao , tamoana eo bawesina ; suisui wa nige se aa , isi labui to labui mo , tamoana eo bawesina .
01007003	Malagaibu manudi hari ao haligigi‐labui , tamoana eo bawesina , arinai edi gorugoru maumauridi se laulau tanoubu potana eai .
01007004	Paana asubena haligigi‐labui eai abo nabu ea hetaru tanoubu potana eai abo asubena tatao‐labui‐se‐mate , maiona tatao‐labui‐se‐mate , i lauesegai ; ginauri maumauridi ea ginauridi , gamagaridi abo ea hearugabaedi tano potana eai ta . ”
01007005	Abo Noa riba gamagaridi GUIAU i lauhesom wa , i ginauriheohidi .
01007006	Noa ena borimai handere haligigi‐esega , nei huia ne dibori utu’utu i lagema tanoubu potana eai .
01007007	Abo Noa ma nanatunayao tatao , ma monena , ma nanatunayao wa monediyao , se awasaegogo ake eai dibori utu’utu goilana wa bena se dagoei .
01007008	Suisui aa’aadi , eo suisui nige se aa , ea manu eo ginauri tano eai tau daladalausi ,
01007009	labui labui , tamoana eo bawesina , Noa maena i abiesegaidi ake wa alona eai , doha Eaubada Noa i lauhesom wa .
01007010	Asubena haligigi‐labui muridi eai , abotai abo dibori utu’utu tanoubu i unuhai .
01007011	Noa ena borimai handere hehaligigi‐esegana eai , nawalai helabuina eai , nawalai asubenana hesaudoudoi‐haligigi‐labuina eai , temeta asubenana eai ne , goila edi aba‐ota gabotum lailaidi eai se malapai , se boriri saema , eo galewa tomlapaidi se soeauridi .
01007012	Nabu abo i taru esegai , tanoubu potana eai asubena tatao‐labui‐se‐mate eo maiona tatao‐labui‐se‐mate .
01007013	Asubena eai ne Noa ma nanatunayao Sema , Hama , eo Iapeta , eo Noa monena , eo nanatunayao monediyao haiona , se awasae ake eai wa .
01007014	Isi maedi suisui udoi udoi ao udoi udoi eai , eo bulumakau adi ao udoi udoi , eo ginauri tau daladalausi , tano eai adi ao udoi udoi eai hinage , eo manu adi ao udoi udoi , manu gamagaridi wa adi ao eai .
01007015	Se awasae ake alona eai , maedi Noa , buluma maudoina mauri eawasina aridi eai wa , labui to labui se awasae .
01007016	Isi tau awasae , buluma maudoina enadi tamoana eo bawesina , se awasae doha Eaubada i lauhesom wa , abotai GUIAU i birigudui .
01007017	Dibori utu’utu wa i laulau asubena tatao‐labui‐se‐mate tanoubu potana eai ; goila tanoubu i laugirihai abo ake wa i lausini , i poupouli , i sae ariri tanoubu ewana eai .
01007018	Goila wa i sae ariri eo tanoubu potana i lau girihai i lau e ake i ahai goila wa potana eai .
01007019	Goila wa i lai ariri eo i didiga tanoubu potana eai i lau e oea tupidi gamagaridi galewa maudoina ubuna eai , i hetauyamuidi .
01007020	Goila i helahelai oea tupidi potadi eai i lau e oea deba pogadi edi gabotum doha kubita saudoudoi‐haligigi .
01007021	Buluma maudoina tanoubu eai se moimoiu ede se mate ohi , manu , bulumakau , suisui , eo ginauri maumauridi eawoidi tanoubu eai se laulau ; eo tatao gamagaridi .
01007022	Ginauri gamagaridi , tano pitapitarina eai taumia , isudi eai mauri eawasina , se mate .
01007023	Ginauri maumauridi tanoubu potana eai ta , i saugabae‐heohidi , tau , suisui , ginauri daladalausidi , malagaibu manudi , tanoubu eai se saugabaedi . Noa iabom ie mia , eo isi wa ia maenayao ake alona eai wa .
01007024	Goila wa tanoubu i laugirihai asubena gamagarina handere esega eo tatao‐labui‐se‐mate‐saudoudoi .
01008001	Na Eaubada Noa i nuatui , eo suisui gamagaridi eo bulumakau gamagaridi ia maena ake eai wa . Abo Eaubada mana i hetoa tanoubu eai , abo goila i hetubu ie dobi ;
01008002	edi aba‐ota gabotum lailaidi eai wa , eo galewa tomlapaidi wa , se gududi , nabu galewa eai se abi‐nuahi .
01008003	Eo huia gamagari magu tanoubu eai i hetubu i laulau . Asubena handere esega eo tatao‐labui‐se‐mate‐saudoudoi adisiga eai goila se dobi’o .
01008004	Eo nawalai hehaligigi‐labuina eai , nawalai asubenana hesaudoudoi‐haligigi‐labuina eai , ake wa ie otadobi Ararata oea tupidi eai .
01008005	Goila wa i dobidobi i lau e nawalai hesaudoudoina eai , nawalai asubenana bagubagunana eai , oea tupidi abotai se taumasaraha .
01008006	Asubena tatao‐labui‐se‐mate muridi eai Noa ake i ginauri wa tomlapaina ie soe .
01008007	Ao’ao i heloi ; ie loi sae , ie loi dobi i lau e goila tanoubu eai se guma’o .
01008008	Abotai bunebune esau i heloi , bena i ita , goila tanoubu eai se guma’o e sora .
01008009	Na bunebune wa aena nige ena aba‐toa i lobai , arinai ie uioma ake eai , paana goila wa sorana tanoubu maudoina potana eai . Arinai nimana i helele , bunebune wa i abiuioi ia arinai , ake alona eai .
01008010	I bagibagiuio asubena haligigi‐labui se lau’o , abotai bunebune ake eai wa i hetamariuioi .
01008011	Maimailahi eai bunebune wa i uioma arinai , to ne , awana eai luguluguna harihariuna ie losi arinai Noa ie ita , omihede goila se guma’o tanoubu eai .
01008012	Abo i bagibagiuio asubena haligigi‐labui headi se lau’o bunebune wa i heloiuioi , na nige i uioma ia arinai .
01008013	Borimai handere hehaligigi‐esegana eai , nawalai bagubagunana asubenana bagubagunana eai , goila se guma’o tanoubu eai ; Noa ake atohina abo i abihai , i italau tanoubu ana ao ie ita , i pitari’o .
01008014	Nawalai helabuina eai , nawalai asubenana tau esega‐i‐mate‐haligigi‐labuina eai , tanoubu abo i pitari mamohoi .
01008015	Abo Eaubada i ribalau Noa arinai , i ene ,
01008016	“ Ake me u pesagabaei , oa ma monem , ma nanatumyao , ma nanatumyao monediyao maemyao .
01008017	Ginauri maumauridi arim eai wa , buluma maudoina u woea‐hepesadi , manu , suisui , ginauri daladalausidi tano eai taudaladalausi wa , bena tanoubu eai ta se hegamagariuioidi , eo au ua , au gamagari tanoubu eai ta . ”
01008018	Arinai abo Noa ie pesa , ma nanatunayao , ma monena eo nanatunayao ma monediyao .
01008019	Eo suisui gamagamagari , eo ginauri se daladalausi , eo manu udoi udoi , eo ginauri saha tanoubu eai ta se moimoiu , ma bodadi ake se pesagabaei .
01008020	Noa abo aitalasam hatahatana i hetoro GUIAU arinai , eo suisui aa’aadi udoi udoi wa , eo manu aa’aadi , esega esega i abidi ena aitalasam hatana eai i gabudi .
01008021	Abo pane lolona GUIAU i ataiei , to GUIAU ia nuana eai i ene , “ Taba nige huia esau tano ea ribahemateuioi tau debana eai , paana tau nuana kamanina i baaea mo , ma hewarina eai i laoma ; taba nige huia esau ginauri maumauridi gamagaridi ea hebaaeauioidi , doha ea ginauriyao wa .
01008022	Tanoubu ma otana eai , umauma huiana eo masuri huiana , huia gogoma eo huia gigibori , huia siwaro eo borimai , taba nige se lautom . ”
01009001	Abo Eaubada Noa mananatunayao i ainauiaidi , aridi eai i ene , “ Au ua hegamagari , tanoubu au hemonau .
01009002	Tano suisuina eo malagaibu manuna abo matausimiu eo mae’emiu eai se laulau , ginauri gamagaridi tano eai se daladalausi hinage gabogabo eamana ; nimamiu eai ede se lediwa .
01009003	Ginauri maumauridi moimoyudi isi abo ami aiai ede , doha hinage ginauri ini’inidi eo ginauri gamagaridi eau ea lediwa’o .
01009004	Taiede taba nige ginauri ma maurina au ai , iaede ma osinana .
01009005	Paana emi mauri osinana abo ea hetala suisui enana hinage abo ea nuatui eo tau enana ; tau ena doga ena mauri maisana ede tau ena mauri .
01009006	Aitea tau , tau esau osinana i heboriri , ia osinana hinage tau abo i heboriri ; paana Eaubada tau i hetubu iabom tautauna eai .
01009007	Na omi , au ua eo au gamagari , aniomiu bena se tubu ariri tanoubu eai ta , eo arinai bena au tadada . ”
01009008	Abo Eaubada i ribalau Noa ma nanatunayao aridi eai i ene ,
01009009	“ Au ita , egu ribahesunuma ea hetoro arimiu eai , eo ami isimurita se laoma aridi eai hinage .
01009010	Eo ginauri maumauridi gamagaridi arimiu eai wa , manu eo bulumakau eo tano taumiaina gamagaridi maemiuyao ake eai au pesama wa .
01009011	Egu aigora ea ribaei arimiu eai , ede taba nige huia esau buluma maudoina ea tomgabaeuioidi dibori utu’utu goiladi eai , eo taba nige huia esau i diboriuio doha nei bena tanoubu i hebaaea . ”
01009012	Abo Eaubada i ene , “ Aigorana heiheinoina ede ina , ede ea ginauri eau eo omi eo ginauri maumauridi maemiuyao wa matada eai , eo isidi gamagaridi maraitom asubena enadi hinage .
01009013	Egu wari ea tore eada eai , abo egu aigora heiheinoina ede , eau eo tanoubu duaduarimai eai .
01009014	Ena eada ea ledima tanoubu ewana eai to boeadi eai wari se ita ,
01009015	abo egu aigora ea henuaisini , ia ede eau eo omi eo buluma ginauridi maumauridi gamagaridi wa matada eai ; ede goila taba nige se hemala abaita lailai bena buluma maudoudoina se hebaaeauioidi .
01009016	Ena wari i taumasaraha eada eai , abo ea italau arinai , abo egu aigora wa i laulau e huia nige nosina wa , ea nuatui , iaede Eaubada eo buluma ginauridi maumauridi gamagaridi eai tanoubu eai . ”
01009017	Eaubada i ribalau Noa arinai i ene , “ Aigora heiheinoina ede ina , eau ea hetoro ede , eau eo buluma maudoudoina tanoubu eai ta matada eai . ”
01009018	Noa nanatunayao tatao wa , isi ede ake se pesagabaei wa , ede Sema , Hama eo Iapeta . Hama ede Kanana tamana .
01009019	Teina tataodi haiona ta ede Noa nanatunayao , isi aridi eai tanoubu maudoina se tubuma .
01009020	Noa ede tano tau giarina bagubagunana . Ia oeana i umai ;
01009021	arinai waina i ginauri , to i nom‐eaueaure to ena numa‐lulu alona eai ie guri , ie ota tau aha’ahana .
01009022	To Hama wa , Kanana tamana , tamana ma kohakohana eai ie ita , to ena tataoyao labui murimuri eai i heribadi .
01009023	Abo Sema eo Iapeta lulu esau se abi , dabayarodi eai se wese , eo se murimuri siwasiwa se laulau e abo tamadi kohakohana se heabobo ; matadi wa se laei hesuara tamadi ma kohakohana wa nige se ita .
01009024	Abotai Noa ena waina nomna arinai i siliata , natuna taumurita wa ena abi i nuatuiya’o .
01009025	I ene , “ Kanana ea ribahebaaea ta ; abo i hemala ena tataoyao edi tauauau edi heaheari . ”
01009026	Hinage i ene , “ GUIAU egu Eaubada ia abo Sema i ainauiai , abo Kanana ia ena heaheari tauauauna .
01009027	Eaubada abo Iapeta i helai , Sema ena numa‐lulu aridi eai abo i mia . abo Kanana ia ena heaheari tauauauna . ”
01009028	Dibori utu’utu wa murina eai , Noa borimai handere haiona eo tatao‐labui‐se‐mate‐saudoudoi ie mia .
01009029	Noa ena asubena gamagaridi ede borimai handere haligigi‐hasi eo tatao labui‐se‐mate‐saudoudoi ; abotai ie mate .
01010001	Noa ma nanatunayao Sema , Hama eo Iapeta , isidi ede ina ; ma nanatudiyao hinage dibori utu’utu wa murina eai se labasidi .
01010002	Iapeta nanatunayao tatao : Gomera , Magoga , Madai , Iavan , Tubala , Meseka eo Tirasa .
01010003	Gomera nanatunayao tatao : Askenasa , Ripata eo Togarama .
01010004	Iavan nanatunayao tatao : Elisa , Tarisiso , Kitima , eo Dodanima .
01010005	Teina tatao ta aridi eai geregere taumia se tadada . Isi wa Iapeta nanatunayao isibom edi tano eai , eo isibom arinadi eo adi bogao eo edi basileia se tubu .
01010006	Hama nanatunayao tatao : Kusa , Aigupito , Puta eo Kanana .
01010007	Kusa nanatunayao tatao : Seba , Havila , Sabata , Raama eo Sabeteka . Raama nanatunayao tatao : Siba eo Dedani .
01010008	Kusa i hemala Nimoroda tamana ; ia taubagubagunana tanoubu eai ta i hemala tau didididigana .
01010009	Ia tauailoea saesaena GUIAU matana eai ; arinai ede se ribaei si ene , “ Doha Nimoroda , tauailoea saesaena GUIAU matana eai . ”
01010010	Ena basileia ena aba‐tubu ede Babela , Ereke , eo Akada eai , gamagaridi Sinara oeana eai .
01010011	Oea eai ne i torohai i lau Asiria , eo Ninive eanuana i hetoro , eo Rehobote‐iro , Kalaha ,
01010012	eo Reseni Ninive eo Kalaha duaduaridi eai ; ia eanua lailaina wa .
01010013	Aigupito i hemala Ludim , Anamino , Lehabim , eo Naputuhim tamadi .
01010014	Eo Paturusim eo Kasuluhim ( Pilistia tataodi edi aba‐laoma ) eo Kapotorim .
01010015	Kanana i hemala Sidona tamana , ana taubaguna , eo Heta .
01010016	Eo Iebusi tataodi , Amore eo Girogaso tataodi .
01010017	Hiwi tataodi , Areka tataodi , Sini tataodi .
01010018	Aravadi tataodi , Semara tataodi eo Hamata tataodi . Abotai Kanana ana isimurita se adau se dobi tanoubu hari tupo eai .
01010019	Kanana tataodi edi tano Sidona eai i tubu i lau e Gerara , ie dobi e lage Gasa , eo Sodoma , Gomara , Adama , Seboima edadi eai i lau e Lahasa eai .
01010020	Teina Hama nanatunayao ede , eo adi bogao , edi arina , edi tano eo edi basileia .
01010021	Sema arinai hinage , Ebera nanatunayao tamadi wa , eo Iapeta ana taubaguna , ia arinai merumeru se labasidi .
01010022	Sema nanatunayao tatao : Elama , Asura , Arepakasa , Luda eo Arama .
01010023	Arama nanatunayao tatao : Usa , Hula , Getera eo Masaha .
01010024	Arepakasa i hemala Sela tamana ; eo Sela i hemala Ebera tamana .
01010025	Ebera arinai tatao labui se labasidi : esau esana Pelege , paana ena mauri asubenadi eai , tanoubu se soiei , eo ena tau esana Ioketana .
01010026	Ioketana nanatunayao Alemodada , Selepi , Hasamaweta , Iera .
01010027	Hadorama , Usala , Dikala ,
01010028	Obala , Abimela , Siba .
01010029	Opira , Havila eo Iobaba ; gamagaridi ta Ioketana nanatunayao ede .
01010030	Tano arinai se mia wa lohana ede Mesa i lau Separa oea tupidi tupo aruabu eai wa .
01010031	Teina Sema ana isimurita , adi bogaoyao , arinadi , edi tano , eo edi basileia .
01010032	Teina Noa nanatunayao adi bogaoyao ede , ma adi isi edi basileia eai ; basileia ta aridi eai se tadada tanoubu tupo gamagari eai , dibori utu’utu wa murina eai .
01011001	Tanoubu maudoina arinadi esega eo riba heguhegurina gonogonoana .
01011002	Tatoa se lauheagogo se lau tupo aruabu , nei eai gonu lailai se lobai Sinara eanuana eai to arinai se mia .
01011003	Abo se oiriba si ene , “ Ehei , hage tano eai ta ginauridi , ta gabu komakomanidi . ” Wau wa se wa se hepaisoaedi doha edi we’u , eo se hepaisoa aba hepatu guduidi .
01011004	Abo si ene , “ Ehei , hage eda eanua lailaina ta hetoro , eo numa lailaina ewana i sae e galewa , abo esada edi aba’ataina abo tanoubu matana eai taba nige se hetatagorigorida . ”
01011005	Abo GUIAU i dobima eanua i itasipoi , eo numa lailaina wa tatao nanatudiyao se hetoro .
01011006	Abo GUIAU i ene , “ Iaede , isi tatao peledi esega , eo arinadi esega ; ina aba hetubuna mo , sora saha abo se ginauri ; saha se nuatui bena se ginauri abo gonoadi se ginauri .
01011007	Besi , ta dobi arinadi ta hepilipilidi , abo esau esau arinadi nige se atailobaidi . ”
01011008	Arinai GUIAU i hetatagorigoridi , nei eai se lau tanoubu tupo gamagari , eo eanua se ginauri wa arinai se paisoa lautom .
01011009	Arinai esana se ribaei Babela , paana nei eai GUIAU tanoubu tataodi arinadi i hepilipilidi , eo nei eai i hetatagorigoridi tanoubu potana eai se lau tupo gamagari .
01011010	Sema ana isimurita ede ina . Sema ena borimai handere esega , abotai i hemala Arepakasa tamana borimai labui dibori utu’utu murina eai .
01011011	Arepakasa se labasi murina eai Sema borimai handere haligigi ie mia , eo nanatunayao headi tatao eo sisine i hetubudi .
01011012	Arepakasa borimai tau‐esega‐i‐mate‐saudoudoi‐haligigi ie mia , abo Sela i hetubu ;
01011013	Sela se labasi murina eai Arepakasa ena borimai handere hasi eo haiona ie mia , eo nanatunayao headi , tatao eo sisine , i hetubudi .
01011014	Sela borimai tau‐esega‐i‐mate‐saudoudoi ie mia , abotai i hemala Ebera tamana ;
01011015	Ebera se labasi murina eai Sela borimai handere hasi eo haiona ie mia , eo nanatunayao headi , tatao eo sisine , i hetubudi .
01011016	Ebera borimai tau‐esega‐i‐mate‐saudoudoi‐hasi ie mia , abotai i hemala Pelege tamana .
01011017	Pelege se labasi murina eai Ebera borimai handere hasi eo tau‐esega‐i‐mate‐saudoudoi ie mia , eo nanatunayao headi , tatao eo sisine , i hetubudi .
01011018	Pelege borimai tau‐esega‐i‐mate‐saudoudoi ie mia , abotai i hemala Reu tamana ;
01011019	Reu se labasi murina eai Pelege borimai handere labui eo haligigi‐hasi ie mia eo nanatunayao headi , tatao eo sisine , i hetubudi .
01011020	Reu borimai tau‐esega‐i‐mate‐saudoudoi‐labui ie mia , abotai i hemala Seruga tamana .
01011021	Seruga se labasi murina eai Reu ena borimai handere labui eo haligigi‐labui ie mia , eo nanatunayao headi , tatao eo sisine , i hetubudi .
01011022	Seruga borimai tau‐esega‐i‐mate saudoudoi ie mia , abotai i hemala Nahora tamana ;
01011023	Nahora se labasi murina eai Seruga borimai handere labui ie mia , eo nanatunayao headi , tatao eo sisine i hetubudi .
01011024	Nahora borimai tau‐esega‐i‐mate eo haligigi‐hasi ie mia , abotai i hemala Teraha tamana ;
01011025	Teraha se labasi murina eai Nahora borimai handere esega eo saudoudoi‐haligigihasi‐ie‐mia , eo nanatunayao headi , tatao eo sisine , i hetubudi .
01011026	Teraha ena borimai tatao‐haiona‐se‐mate‐saudoudoi ie mia , abotai i hemala Aberama tamana eo Nahora , eo Harana .
01011027	Teraha ana isimurita ede ina . Teraha ia Aberama , Nahora , eo Harana tamadi ; na Harana ia Lota tamana .
01011028	Harana ia i mate baguna , sora tamana ma miana eai , edi eanua edi aba‐labasina eai , ede Uro , Kalidea tataodi enadi wa .
01011029	Aberama eo Nahora monediyao se tawasoraidi ; Aberama monena wa esana Sara , eo Nahora monena esana Mileka , ia Harana natuna , Mileka eo Iseka tamadi wa .
01011030	Na Sara mo i agari ; ia nige natuna .
01011031	Teraha natuna Aberama eo tubuna Lota , Harana wa natuna , eo bosiana‐sine Sara natuna Aberama wa monena , i woeahaidi Uro , Kalidea tataodi edi eanua , se laugabaei se lau Kanana oeana eai ; na Harana eai se lage abo se tarutoro eo nei eai se miahai .
01011032	Teraha ena asubena gamagarina ede borimai handere labui eo haligigi ; abo Teraha Harana eai ie mate .
01012001	GUIAU i ribalau Aberama arinai i ene , “ Em eanua , am bogaoyao , eo tamam ena numa , u torohaigabaedi , u lau eanua esau arinai , iaede abo ea heitam .
01012002	Eau abo ea hetorom u hemala basileia lailaina , abo ea ainauiaim , esam abo ea helai , arinai oa abo tauainauia .
01012003	Isi tauainauiaim abo hinage ea ainauiaidi , eo ia tauribahematem abo hinage ea ribahemate ; na oa debam eai boga gamagari tanoubu eai helolona abo se lobai . ”
01012004	Arinai Aberama i torohai , doha GUIAU i heriba wa ; Lota hinage maena se lau . Aberama ena borimai tatao‐haiona‐se‐mate saudoudoi‐haligigi , huiana ne Harana i torohaigabaei .
01012005	Aberama monena Sara i woeai , eo Lota ena tau natuna wa , eo edi gogo gamagari se lauheagogo , eo edi tataoyao Harana eai se abidi ; eo se torohai bena se lau Kanana tanona eai . Se lage’o Kanana tanona eai .
01012006	Aberama eanua i baeawai i lau e ie lage teha esau Sekema eai , More aiaruna wa arinai . Nei huiana eai ne Kanana tataodi ma miadi tano eai ne .
01012007	Abo GUIAU i taumasaraha Aberama arinai , i ene , “ Am isimurita aridi eai tano ta abo ea mosedi . ” Arinai aba‐aitalasam esau i hetoro metai , GUIAU enana wa i taumasaraha arinai .
01012008	Abo i taulau oea tupina Beteli tupo aruabuna eai , ena numa‐lulu i hetoro , Beteli tupo ealasi eai , eo Eiai tupo aruabu eai , nei eai aba‐aitalasam esau i hetoro GUIAU enana , eo GUIAU esana i atai .
01012009	Abotai Aberama ena lauwasi i lauei Negeba hesabana ie lau .
01012010	Abo guriam lailai ie tubu eanua eai ne . Arinai Aberama ie dobi Aigupito , nei eai bena i mia , paana guriam wa i baaea ariri edi tupo eai .
01012011	Se hanahanau bena se lage Aigupito eai , i ribalau monena Sara arinai , i ene , “ Ea nuatui oa sine abo se itam am ao i lolo ,
01012012	Aigupito tataodi se itam abo si ene , ‘ Teina monena ede ; ’ arinai eau abo si unuigu , oa mo abo se hemiam .
01012013	U riba u ene oa lougu , arinai abo i lau loloegu oa debam eai eo abo se eari ea mauri . ”
01012014	Aberama i lusora Aigupito eai hinage Aigupito tataodi se ita hede sine wa ana ao i lolo ariri .
01012015	Parao ena wasawasa headi ia se ita hinage se ribatausaei Parao arinai . Abo sine wa se abi se laei Parao ena numa eai .
01012016	Sine wa debana eai Aberama i abi komakomani ; ena mamoe , ena bulumakau , ena asini tamoadi , ena tatao‐paisoa , ena sisine‐paisoa , ena asini bawesinadi eo ena kamela , enana se mosedi .
01012017	Na GUIAU Parao i heai’iwala , ma ena numa taumiana , iwala lailaidi se hearodi , Sara , Aberama monena wa , debana eai .
01012018	Abo Parao Aberama i eogai , i ene , “ Saha ina ue abi arigu eai ta ? Paana saha nige u heribagu u ene ia monem ?
01012019	Paana saha u ene , ‘ Ia lougu ’ arinai ea abi bena monegu ? Ehei , monem ede ina , u woeai au lau . ”
01012020	Parao tatao abo i lauhesomdi Aberama debana eai ; abo dobila eai se woeai se woeai se hetamari , ma monena eo maena ginauri maudoidi .
01013001	Arinai Aberama Aigupito i laugabaei , ia ma monena , eo ena ginauri maudoidi , maena Lota hinage , se seuio Negeba eai .
01013002	Aberama ena gogo abo i laiariri , suisui , eo eo .
01013003	Ena lauwasi wa Negeba eai i taudaru ie lau e Beteli eai ie lage , ena numa‐lulu ena aba‐hetorona bagubagunana eai wa , Beteli eo Eiai sorasoradi eai .
01013004	Eanua wa arinai aba‐aitalasam ena aba‐hetorona wa ; temetai Aberama GUIAU esana i atai .
01013005	Lota ia Aberama i hemuriwatai wa , ia hinage ena mamoe eawoidi eo ena bulumakau eo ena numa‐lulu se gamagari .
01013006	Nige gonoadi tanona ne i heaidi ena se mia esega , paana edi gogo se lai ariariri , nige gonoadi se mia gogo .
01013007	Eo hinage Aberama ena bulumakau tauitawataidi eo Lota ena bulumakau tauitawataidi se haihaiabi . Huia eai ne Kanana tataodi eo Perisi tataodi tano ne se haihaimiai .
01013008	Abo Aberama i ribalau Lota arinai i ene , “ Oa eo eau tabu ta haiabi eo em heaheari tataodi egu heaheari tataodi hinage , paana ita boga esega .
01013009	Tano maudoina ede matam eai me , e nige’e ? Besi u abihesuara’uioim . Ena tupo nima‐seuseurim eai u abi , eau abo tupo tutu eai ea lau ; e ena oa bena tupo tutu u abi , eau abo ea lau tupo seuseuri eai . ”
01013010	Abo Lota matana i helabaisinidi , Ioridana gonuna ie ita , goilana se gamagari tupo gamagari eai , doha GUIAU ena oea , doha Aigupito tanona , Soara edana eai wa , huiana eai wa GUIAU sora nige Sodoma eo Gomara i hebaaeadi .
01013011	Arinai Lota Ioridana gonuna iabom enana i hineri , eo Lota ie lau tupo aruabu ; arinai se hai‐tausuaraedi .
01013012	Aberama Kanana oeana eai ie mia , na Lota eanua lailaidi gonu eai wa boeadi eai ie mia eo ena numa‐lulu i hesigilaei i lau Sodoma eai .
01013013	Wau Sodoma tataodi se hemanabara ariri , GUIAU tauhebaaeana saesaedi ede isi .
01013014	Lota i abihesuara’uioi wa murina eai GUIAU i ribalau Aberama arinai , i ene , “ Matam u helabaisinidi , em aba‐toro eai me u italau , tupo bauri , tupo eawana , tupo aruabu , tupo ealasi ,
01013015	paana eanua maudoina u itaitai ne abo ea leawa , eo am isimurita , i lau e huia gamagari ana huia ana tasi .
01013016	Am isimurita abo ea hetubudi doha tano muaridi ; ena gonoana tano muaridi se hasiridi abo gonoana hinage am isimurita se hasiridi .
01013017	U toro , tano ta u taudadai , lohana eo magagana , paana eau abo ea leawa . ”
01013018	Arinai Aberama ena numa‐lulu i hesigilaei , i laoma Mamare aiarudi boeadi eai ie mia , isi ede Heberona eai wa ; nei eai hinage aba‐aitalasam hatana i hetoro GUIAU enana .
01014001	Huiadi eai ne Amerapele ia Sinara edi wasawasa , Arioka ia Elasara edi wasawasa , Kedorolaoma ia Elama edi wasawasa , eo Tidala ia Goiima edi wasawasa ,
01014002	teina wasawasa ta iala se hetubu Bera , Sodoma edi wasawasa arinai , eo Birisa , Gomara edi wasawasa arinai , eo Sinaba , Adama edi wasawasa arinai , eo Semeba , Seboima edi wasawasa arinai , eo Bela edi wasawasa hinage ( ia ede Soara wa . )
01014003	Gamagaridi se heoiesegaidi Sidima gonuna eai ( ia ede Gabogabo Ariaritana wa . )
01014004	Borimai saudoudoi‐labui Kedorolaoma se heayaiyei , na borimai hesaudoudoi‐haiona na na se oipiriei .
01014005	Kedorolaoma ena borimai hesaudoudoi‐hasina eai ia eo wasawasa maenayao wa se laoma tatao ta se saepoidi , Repaima Aseterota‐karanaima eai wa , eo Susim Hama eai wa , eo Emima Save‐kiriataima eai wa .
01014006	Eo Hori tataodi edi oea‐tupina Seira eai wa i lau Elparana eai , barabara lailai sigasigana eai .
01014007	Abotai se sinibui se laoma Eni‐misapata ( ia ede Kadesa ) eo tano maudoina se saepoi , Amaleka tataodi enadi eo Amore tataodi enadi hinage , isi wa Hasasona‐tamara eai se miamia .
01014008	Abotai Sodoma edi wasawasa , Gomara edi wasawasa , Adama edi wasawasa Seboima edi wasawasa eo Bela edi wasawasa , ( ia ede Soara ) se torohai se lau iala hesabana Sidima gonuna eai wa ,
01014009	bena Kedorolaoma , Elama edi wasawasa , eo Tidala , Goiima edi wasawasa , Amarapele , Sinara edi wasawasa , eo Arioka , Elasara edi wasawasa , se ialaidi , wasawasa hasi se lau wasawasa haligigi hesabadi .
01014010	Na Sidima gonuna ipudi se monau ; Sodoma eo Gomara edi wasawasa se dagodago , na isi headi wau ipudi aridi eai se beu maudoidi se dago se sae oea tupidi eai .
01014011	Arinai adi waiunu wa Sodoma eo Gomara edi gogo gamagaridi se girihaidi , eo adi aiai maudoidi se baheidi se laedi .
01014012	Lota hinage se toai , Aberama ena tau natuna Sodoma eai i miamia wa , ena gogo hinage se abiesegaidi to se lau .
01014013	Abotai tau esau taudagogabaedi i laoma Aberama i heriba , ia Heberu tauna , Mamare ena aiaru boeadi eai i mia . Amore tauna wa , Esekola eo Anera edi tau ; ina tatao ta Aberama tausaguidi ede .
01014014	Aberama wasa i ataiei ana boga esau se abi se pai , abo ia ena tataoyao se heata komakomanidi’o , ena numa eai se labasidi , tataodi handere haiona eo saudoudoi‐haligigi‐haiona , i woeaidi se aihenau se lau e se lage Dani eai .
01014015	Ena tatao i soi komakomanidi maiona eai , ia maena heaheari tataodi se hetatagorigoridi eo se henaudi i lau e Hoba eai , Damaseko tupo bauri eai .
01014016	Abo gogo maudoina wa i baheuioi , eo ana boga tauna Lota i woeauioi , maena gogo , ena sisine eo ena tatao .
01014017	Kedorolaoma eo wasawasa maenayao wa tausaguina wa i hetatagorigoridi to i uioma na Sodoma edi wasawasa i torohai bena i hailobai Save gonuna eai ( ia ede Wasawasa ena Gonu . )
01014018	Abo Melekisedeka Salem edi wasawasa falawa eo waina i bahema , ia Eaubada Saesae‐aririna ena kohena tauna .
01014019	Eo i ribaheloloei i ene , “ Eaubada Saesae‐aririna Aberama i ribahewoiwoinaei , ia wa galewa eo tanoubu tauginauridi ;
01014020	Eo Eaubada Saesae‐aririna ia i nuawoiwoinaem , am waiunuyao wa taulediwa nimam eai ! ” Eo Aberama ginauri gamagaridi wa i soiedi , hesaudoudoina lausoisoina esega i mosei .
01014021	Sodoma edi wasawasa Aberama arinai ie riba i ene , “ Dodoga mo u ledima , na gogo u abi oabom enam . ”
01014022	Na Aberama Sodoma edi wasawasa arinana i heuio i ene , “ GUIAU Eaubada Saesaearirina galewa eo tanoubu tauginauridi , arinai ea riba aigora’o .
01014023	Oa em ginauri taba nige maina bodibodi e ae’um aba‐auna e oa em ginauri esa enam ea abilau arinai , ata u ene , ‘ Eau Aberama ana gogo lailai taumoseina . ’
01014024	Eau taba nige saha ea abi , egu hewari adi aiai mo se aiya’o , eo tatao maeguyao taulau wa edi tupo abo se abi , Anera , Esekola , eo Mamare isi hinage edi tupo taba se abi . ”
01015001	Teina ginauridi ta muridi eai GUIAU ena riba i laoma Aberama arinai , enosuai eai , “ Aberama e , tabu u matausi , eau em opea ede , em ainauia abo i lai ariri . ”
01015002	Na Aberama i ene , “ Guiau EAUBADA , saha abo u leama , paana eau nige natugu , eo egu numa tanuagana hede Eliesera , Damaseko tauna wa . ”
01015003	Aberama i ene , “ U ita , nige natugu u leama , arinai tau‐auau esau egu numa eai se labasi , ia abo egu gogo tauabina . ”
01015004	Na hedeona , GUIAU ena riba i uioma arinai , i ene , “ Teina tau ta ia taba nige em gogo tauabina ; oabom natum tahunuana em gogo abo i abi . ”
01015005	Ia abo i woea‐hepesa , i ene , “ U itasae galewa eai , ipora hage u hasiridi ena gonoana u hasiridi . ” Abo i ribalau arinai i ene , “ Am isimurita abo doha ede . ”
01015006	Na ia GUIAU ena riba i awa‐mamohoiei , arinai ede se nuatulaei si ene laulau‐duduraina meta .
01015007	Eo i ribalau arinai i ene , “ Eau GUIAU tau‐woeahaim Uro eai , Kalidea tataodi enadi wa , bena eanua ta ea leawa u abi enam . ”
01015008	Na ia i heuio i ene , “ Guiau EAUBADA e , edohana abo ea nuatui , hede abo ea abi enagu ? ”
01015009	Arinai i ene , “ Bulumakau bawesina ena borimai haiona u leama , eo goti bawesina ena borimai haiona , eo mamoe tamoana ena borimai haiona , eo bunebune , eo gabubu natuna . ”
01015010	Ginauri gamagaridi ta i abidima , i tomutusidi , tupo esa i torelaei tupo esa potana eai , manu mo nige i tomutusidi .
01015011	Manu sinare tauaidi se loidobima eaudi wa hesabadi , na Aberama i henaudi se lau .
01015012	Mahana ie dui na Aberama i enomate ariri ; to matausi eo masigiri lailai aririna se taru potana eai .
01015013	Abo GUIAU i ribalau Aberama arinai i ene , “ Nuam eai bena i masaraha ariri , am isimurita abo eanua udoi arinai se mia , eanuana nige enadi , na ma‐auaudi abo se mia , eo abo se heporohedi borimai handere hasi sorasoradi eai .
01015014	Na basileia wa se heayaiyei eau abo heduduraina ea ginauri , eo abotai abo se pesagabaei ma edi gogo maudoidi .
01015015	Na oa mo abo u lau tamamyao aridi eai ma nuabigam ; u tautaubada‐ariri’o abotai se torem .
01015016	Isi abo se uioma inai , isi hehasina huiana eai ; paana Amore tataodi edi baaea sora nige se ohi mamohoi . ”
01015017	Mahana i dui’o eo i masigiri’o , abo ne gulewa ginaha aba baheina ma asuasuna , eo osiri ala‐balebalelemna se taumasaraha wau aitalasam suisui eaudi wa boeadi eai .
01015018	Asubena eai ne GUIAU ena aigora i ginauri Aberama arinai i ene , “ Am isimurita tano ta abo ea mosedi , Aigupito sagana eai i lau saga lailaina eai wa , Euparatea sagana .
01015019	Kemi tataodi edi tano , eo Kenisa , eo Kademonia ,
01015020	eo Hito , eo Perisi , eo Repaima .
01015021	Eo Amore , eo Kanana , eo Girogaso , eo Iebusi enadi . ”
01016001	Sara , Aberama monena wa , ia nige nanatunayao i labasidi . Ena heaheari Aigupito sinena esana ede Hagara .
01016002	Abo Sara i ribalau Aberama arinai i ene , “ U itayao GUIAU abi merumeru eai i nuahigu ; besi , u lau egu heaheari sinena arinai ; ata bena ia debana eai abo nanatuguyao ea lobaidi . ” Aberama Sara arinana ea i awaabiei .
01016003	Arinai Aberama Kanana tehana eai borimai saudoudoi i mia’o , abotai Sara , Aberama monena , ena heaheari Aigupito sinena wa Hagara i woeai monena Aberama arinai , bena monena .
01016004	To ie lau Hagara arinai , to i heabi ; ia wa huiana i italobai ie boga abo ena tanuaga i isuewaei .
01016005	Sara abo ie ribalau Aberama arinai i ene , “ Se abi‐baaeaigu ta oa hinage am giru ! Egu heaheari sinena eau ea leawa nuapoum eai em haitalagado eai , i lau e i itayao ie boga abotai i isuewaigu . GUIAU abo i hegiruda , oa eo eau ! ”
01016006	Na Aberama Sara ena riba i heuio i ene , “ Taiede , em heaheari sinena ta ede oa nimam eai ; saha u henua u abi arinai abo u abi . ” Abo Sara sine wa i abi‐baaeai , to ie dago .
01016007	GUIAU ena aneru sine wa abo i lobai , barabara eai , goila bunubunuasina esau gegesina eai , bunubunuasina wa Sura edana eai .
01016008	I ribalau arinai i ene , “ Hagara , Sara ena heaheari sinena e , haedi eai u laoma eo haedi u laulau ina ? ” I ene , “ Tanuagagu Sara arinai ea dadago . ”
01016009	GUIAU ena aneru abo i ribalau i ene , “ U seuio am tanuaga arinai , eo arinai u awaabi . ”
01016010	GUIAU ena aneru ie riba hinage , i ene , “ Am isimurita abo ea hegamagari aririedi , edi gamagari taba nige si hasiridi . ”
01016011	Eo GUIAU ena aneru wa enaba , “ U ita , oa ue boga , eo natum tau abo u labasi ; esana abo u tore Isamaela ; paana GUIAU i atailaowa em nuaamamna arinai .
01016012	Ia abo tau‐hemanabara tauna , doha nuura asinina , nimana abo tatao gamagaridi i ialaidi , tatao gamagaridi hinage nimadi ia abo se ialai ; eo ana bogaoyao abo i miasuaraedi eo i hewaiunuedi . ”
01016013	Arinai GUIAU enana tauriba wa esana i atai , “ Oa tauitagu Eaubadana , ” paana i ene “ Mamohoi ede , wa , Eaubada ea i’ita , ea itayao na sora mamaumaurigu . ”
01016014	Arinai goila wa esana se ribaei Biera‐lahai‐roi ; ia ede Kadesa eo Bereda duaduaridi eai .
01016015	Hagara Aberama natuna abo i labasi ; eo Aberama natuna Hagara i labasi wa esana ie tore Isamaela .
01016016	Aberama ena borimai tatao‐hasi‐se‐mate‐haligigi‐esega huiana ne Hagara Aberama natuna i labasi .
01017001	Aberama ena borimai se lage’o tatao‐hasi‐se‐mate‐saudoudoi‐harigigi‐hasi GUIAU i taumasaraha Aberama arinai , i ribalau i ene , “ Eau Gigibori‐aririna Eaubadana ; matagu eai bena u laulau eo nige aba hegirum .
01017002	Egu aigora oa eo eau matada eai wa abo , ea hemamohoiei , eo oa abo ea hegamagari‐aririem . ”
01017003	Aberama abo i duludobi tano eai , abo Eaubada i ribalau arinai , i ene ,
01017004	“ U ita , egu aigora wa u abiyao , oa abo basileia gamagaridi tamadi ede .
01017005	Esam taba nige se ataiuioi Aberama , esam abo se atai Aberahama , paana ea hetorom basileia moutuadi tamadi .
01017006	Abo ea ainauiaim u ua ariariri ; basileia arim eai abo se tubu , eo wasawasa abo boeam eai se laoma .
01017007	Egu aigora , oa eo eau matada eai wa , abo ea hemamohoiei am isimurita se tubu‐muritama aridi eai , i lau e hari isi to hari isi , aigora miatahitahina , eau abo em Eaubada , am isimurita enadi hinage .
01017008	Em aba‐tautausi tanona ta abo ea leawa oa arim eai , eo am isimurita se muritama aridi eai , Kanana tanona maudoudoina ta , abo enamiu i lau e huia nige nosina ; eau hinage abo edi Eaubada . ”
01017009	Eaubada ie riba Aberahama arinai i ene , “ Na oa mo , oa abo egu aigora ribadi u sogohidi , oa eo am isimurita se murimuritama wa , isidi gamagaridi eai .
01017010	Egu aigora heiheinoina ina , abo au abiwatai , eau eo oa eo am isimurita murim eai , enadi , boeamiu eai tatao gamagaridi abo se peritome .
01017011	Abo se heperitomemiu opimiu bulumadi eai , eda aigora heiheinoina abo , eau eo omi duaduarida eai .
01017012	Eai boeamiu eai ena asubena hehaligigi‐haionana eai abo se heperitome ; merumeru tatao , am isi gamagaridi eai , numa eai se labasidi e em moni eai ue uneidi murimuri tauna esau arinai ia nige natumiu mamohoi .
01017013	Ia wa em numa eai , eo ia wa em moni eai se unehai , taudi labui abo se peritomedi . Arinai abo egu aigora wa bulumamiu eai , aigorana taba nige i lautom .
01017014	Tau esa nige se peritome bulumana opina eai abo ena tataoyao boeadi eai se tomhai ; egu aigora i utusi ede . ”
01017015	Eaubada abo i ribalau Aberahama arinai , i ene , “ Na Sara monem wa , tabu esana u atai Sara , ia esana abo Saraha .
01017016	Ia abo ea ainauiai , hinage oa natum abo eo leawa , ia debana eai ; abo ea ainauiai to i hemala basileia gamagaridi sinadi ; tatao edi wasawasa ia boeana eai abo se tubuma . ”
01017017	Aberahama abo i gurisalaoba matana eai , to i maruhi iabom nuana eai , ie riba i ene , “ Abo merumeru se labasi tau ena borimai handere esega arinai ? Abo Saraha natuna i labasi , ia i lage’o borimai tatao‐hasi‐se‐mate saudoudoi ? ”
01017018	Abo Aberahama i riba Eaubada arinai , i ene , “ Ae , taba Isamaela i mia matam eai mo ! ”
01017019	Eaubada i ene , “ Nige’e , na monem Saraha abo natum i labasi , eo esana abo u atai Isaako . Egu aigora abo ea hemamohoiei ia arinai , aigora miamiatahitahina eo ana isimurita murina eai enadi hinage .
01017020	Na Isamaela wa , em riba ea ataieiya’o ; u ita , abo ea ainauiai hinage , ea he’ua eo ea hegamagari aririei ; wasawasa saudoudoi‐labui ia abo tamadi ede , abo ea hetoro i hemala basileia saesaena .
01017021	Na egu aigora wa Isaako arinai abo ea hetoro , ia wa Saraha abo enam i labasi , inata arinai ie lau borimai esega . ”
01017022	Maena se ribariba lautom , Eaubada i laugabaei .
01017023	Aberahama natuna Isamaela abo i woeai , maena ena heaheari tauauau tataodi ena numa eai se labasidi , eo ena moni eai se unehaidi , tau maudoina Aberahama ena numa tataodi , to bulumadi opidi eai i heperitomedi asubena esega eai ne , doha Eaubada i heriba wa .
01017024	Aberahama ena borimai tatao‐hasi‐se‐mate‐saudoudoi‐haligigi‐hasi huiana ne bulumana opina eai se heperitome .
01017025	Natuna tau Isamaela ena borimai saudoudoihaiona se lauo abo se heperitome bulumana opina eai .
01017026	Asubena esega eai Aberahama eo natuna Isamaela se heperitome esegaidi .
01017027	Eo tatao gamagaridi ena numa eai se labasidi , eo isi wa moni eai se unehaidi murimuri‐tataodi aridi eai , maenayao se heperitome esegaidi .
01018001	GUIAU i taumasaraha ia arinai , Mamare aiarudi eai , ia ena numa‐lulu dobilana eai i babawa , asuasubenalai gigiborina eai .
01018002	Matana i helabaisinidi ie italau , hede tatao haiona matana eai se totoro . Ie itadi abo ena numa‐lulu wa dobilana i laugabaei ie tau hesabadi bena i hailobaidi , abo tano eai i tabaohu .
01018003	I ene , “ Egu guiau e , ena matam eai ea henualolom , tabu em heaheari tauna u laugabaei .
01018004	Goila begana hage se leawa , aemiu aba deuridi , eo au aieawasi begana oeagi loguloguna eai ta .
01018005	Na aiai ami begana ea leama , amnamiu se lolo abotai emi eda eai au lau ; paana au laoma’o ina emi heaheari tauna arinai . ” To si ene , “ Besi , doha u ribaei wa u ginauri . ”
01018006	Abo Aberahama i heuheula ie lau numa‐lulu alona eai wa , Saraha arinai , eo i ene , “ U heula falawa lolololona nonoina haiona u henonohaidi , u helasa eo keke u ginauridi . ”
01018007	Aberahama abo i aitautau ena bulumakau eawoina arinai , bulumakau natuna esau ie abi , natuhariuna , lolo aririna , i mosei ena heaheari esau arinai , ia ie abi heulai bena i henonohai .
01018008	Abo bata eo susu ie abi , eo bulumakau natuna se henonohaiya’o wa , eo i toredi matadi eai wa na isi se aiai .
01018009	Se ribalau ia arinai si ene , “ Monem Saraha wa ia haedi ? ” Ia i ene , “ Ia hede numa‐lulu alona eai . ”
01018010	I ene , “ Abo ea uioma arimiu eai , borimai sigana eai , monem Saraha abo natum i labasi . ” Na Saraha wa ia numa‐lulu guduna murina eai i ata’atai , dagelana eai .
01018011	Aberahama eo Saraha se tautaubada se sinesinebada ariri , eo edi borimai se gamagari ; sisine kamanidi wa Saraha arinai i lautom’o .
01018012	Arinai Saraha nuaboeana eai i maruhi , i ene , “ Ea sinesinebada’o , eo monegu i tautaubada’o , abo gonoamai kodena ai lobai ? ”
01018013	GUIAU abo ie riba Aberahama arinai , i ene , “ Paana saha Saraha i maruhi , eo i ene , ‘ Mamohoi abo merumeru ea labasi , ea sinesinebada’o ta ? ’
01018014	Au ene bena ginauri esau i piripiri ariri GUIAU arinai ? Huiana se tauribaei , arinai abo ea uioma , borimai sigana eai , Saraha natuna tau abo i abi . ”
01018015	Na Saraha i halele , i ene , “ Eau nige ea maruhi ” — paana i matausi . GUIAU i ene , “ Nige’e , na u maruhi wa ! ”
01018016	Abo tatao wa se torohai , se italau Sodoma edana eai ; Aberahama maedi se lau , bena edi dobila eai i healatudi .
01018017	GUIAU i ene , “ Laulau abo ea ginauri wa , abo ea toreyamui Aberahama arinai , wa ?
01018018	Paana ia abo i hemala basileia saesaena eo gigigiborina , eo tanoubu basileiadi gamagaridi abo se helolouioidi ia debana eai .
01018019	Nige’e , paana ia egu hineri tauna , abo nanatunayao eo ena numa tataodi murina eai i heatadi GUIAU ena laulau se sogohidi , laulau dudurai eo abi dudurai hinage ; bena GUIAU saha i ribahesunumadi wa abo i hetubudi Aberahama arinai . ”
01018020	Abotai GUIAU i ene , “ Lauhegiru Sodoma eo Gomara aridi eai i lai ariri , paana edi baaea i lai ariariri ,
01018021	Arinai abo ea dobi ea ita , lauhegiru i laoma arigu eai wa , mamohoi se ginauri ede ; eo ena nige’e , abo abina ea ata . ”
01018022	Arinai tatao wa se sinibui , se lau Sodoma hesabana ; na Aberahama sora i totoro GUIAU matana eai .
01018023	Aberahama i sigilaoma i ene , “ Mamohoi abo tatao duduraidi u hebaaeadi maediyao tatao baaeadi wa ?
01018024	Ena taba ta ene tatao duduraidi tatao‐labui‐se‐mate‐saudoudoi ma miadi eanua eai me , abo eanuana u hebaaea , taba nige u nuatoatoaei wau tatao duduraidi tatao‐labui‐se‐mate‐saudoudoi miamiadi wa debadi eai ?
01018025	Oa taba nige em laulau doha nei , laulau dudurai tataodi eo laulau baaea tataodi u unuesegaidi doha tatao baaeadi se heai gonogonoaiei ! Taba nige em laulau doha nei ! Tanoubu maudoina Tauheduduraina abo nige ena abi i dudurai ? ”
01018026	Abo GUIAU i ene , “ Ena Sodoma eai tau laulau dudurai tatao‐labui‐se‐mate‐saudoudoi ea lobaidi , eanuana abo ea nuatoatoaei , isi debadi eai . ”
01018027	Aberahama riba ta i heuio i ene , “ U ita , nuagu ea tore ina , bena Guiau arinai ea riba , eau doha wenu eo ahu mo .
01018028	Ena taba ta ene , wau tau laulau duduraidi tatao‐labui‐se‐mate‐hesaudoudoina wa haligigi wa nige’e ? Abo eanua maudoina u hebaaea , paana haligigi wa nige’e ? ” I ene , “ Taba nige ea hebaaea ena tatao‐labui‐se‐mate‐haligigi nei eai ea lobaidi . ”
01018029	Abo i ribauio , i ene , “ Ena taba tatao‐labui‐se‐mate mo u lobaidi nei eai ? ” I heuio i ene , “ Tatao labui‐se‐mate mo debadi eai taba nige eo ginauri . ”
01018030	Abo i ene , “ Agutoi , tabu Guiau i ouyalayala , na egu riba ea ribaei mo . Ena tau esega‐i‐mate‐saudoudoi se lobaidi nei eai ? ” I heuio i ene “ Taba nige ea ginauri , ena tau‐esega‐i‐mate‐saudoudoi ea lobaidi nei eai . ”
01018031	Abo i ene , “ U itagu ta , awagu ea dabariyao Guiau arinai . Ena taba tau‐esege‐i‐mate se lobaidi ? ” I heuio i ene , “ Tau‐esega‐i‐mate debadi eai taba nige ea hebaaea . ”
01018032	Abo i ene , “ Agutoi , tabu Guiau i ouyalayala , na ma esegana ta ea ribauio . Ena taba saudoudoi se lobaidi nei eai ? ” I heuio i ene , “ Saudoudoi debadi eai taba nige ea hebaaea . ”
01018033	Abo GUIAU ena eda eai ie lau , huiana maena Aberahama se ribariba lautom ; na Aberaham ie uio ena abamia eai .
01019001	Aneru labui wa maimailahi eai se lage Sodoma eai ; na Sodoma dobila aba lusorana eai Lota i babawa . Lota ie itadi abo i toro bena i hailobaidi , eo i tabaohu dobi tano eai .
01019002	I ene , “ Egu guiau e , ea aibodaimiu bena au awasaema emi heaheari ta ena numa eai au eno , eo aemiu au deuridi ; maraitom abo au toro heula emi dobila eai au lau . ” Si ene , “ Nige’e , ai abo maiona ta ai abi eanua dobiladi eai . ”
01019003	Na i dudu adidiri ; arinai se utugesi , se awasae ena numa eai ; adi mataasi i ginauri eo falawa ahaaha adi ie gabu , to se ai .
01019004	Na sora nige se eno , eanua tataodi , Sodoma tataodi , hewahewaridi eo tatao lailaidi , tau maudoina , numa se hetaiiri .
01019005	Lota arinai se eoga si ene , “ Tatao wa haedi , maiona ta se laowa arim eai wa ? U hepesadima arimai eai bena abidi ai ata . ”
01019006	Lota ie lau numa dobila guduna eai tatao aridi eai , ena numa guduna dagelana eai ie gudu ,
01019007	I ene , “ Egu tataoyao e , ea aibodaimiu ta , tabu emi laulau se baaea doha ina .
01019008	Besi eau nanatuguyao sisine labui , isi sora nige tau se hailobai , besi ea hepesadiwa , saha au henua aridi eai au abi abo au abi ; ia mo tatao ta aridi eai tabu saha au abi , paana isi se laoma egu numa tauaitaumana . ”
01019009	Na isi mo si ene , “ U torohihisi . ” Eo si ene , “ Tau ta ia taulaolaoma mo , na bena i toro doha tauhedudurai ! Sora oa abo ai abi‐baaea aririem , abotai isi . ” Lota se dudui aririei , se hanahanaui arinai bena dobila guduna se eatulopa .
01019010	Na wau tatao labui wa numa‐alo eai wa nimadi se helele Lota se toai se niuriama aridi eai , dobilana se gudu .
01019011	Tatao numa dobilana eai se totoro wa matadi se oihegibudi , gagiridi eo lailaidi , i lau e se heoheoidada dobila se eo’oeo’oi , to se heamnabaaeauioidi .
01019012	Abotai wau tatao labui se ribalau Lota arinai si ene , “ Em tataoyao aidobudi inai ? Bosiamyao , eo nanatumyao tatao , e nanatumyao sisine , enamyao eai eanua eai ta , teha eai ta u woea‐hepesadi .
01019013	Paana teha ta abo ai hebaaea , paana oipilina taumiaina debadi eai i lai ariri , GUIAU matana eai , arinai ede GUIAU i hetamarimai bena ai hebaaea . ”
01019014	Arinai Lota ie pesa , i ribalau tatao bosianayao aridi eai , isi bena abo nanatunayao sisine se tawasoraidi wa , i ene , “ Ehei , eanua ta au torohaigabaei ; paana GUIAU eanua ta abo i hebaaea . ” Na bosianayao wa aridi eai riba doha talawasi mo .
01019015	Huiana mara i iuiari , aneru wa Lota se dudui , si ene , “ U torohai , monem ma nanatumyao sisine labui inai wa u woeahaidi , ata eanua ta ena maisa eai abo au putuhai . ”
01019016	Na Lota i laulau bebeda , arinai tatao labui wa se tabelaeidi , ia ma monena , ma nanatunayao sisine labui , nimadi eai se abilau , GUIAU hede i nuatoatoaedi , arinai i woeaidi eo i hetorohaidi eanua murimurina eai .
01019017	Se woea‐hepesadi abo si ene , “ Au dago emi mauri debana eai ; tabu au itasinibui , e haedi gonu eai ta au tarutoro , ata se unuimiu . ”
01019018	Lota abo i ribalau aridi eai , i ene , “ Agu tanuagayao , taba nige’e .
01019019	Na emi heaheari tauna ta nualolomiu i hearo ina , eo emi abi se lolo ariri arinai au hemaurigu ta ; na taba nige ea dago ea lau oea tupidi eai , ata nei eai sabom i hearogu to ea mate .
01019020	Au italau nei , eanua esau hanahanau eai , gonoagu arinai taba ea dago hinage eanua gagirina wa . Metai bena ea dago — i gagiri , e nige’e ? — abo nei eai egu mauri ea abi ! ”
01019021	I ribaheuio i ene , “ Besi , em aiboda ta ea leawa hinage , arinai eanua u ribaei ne taba nige ea hebaaea .
01019022	U dago heula arinai ; taba nige saha ea ginauri i lau e u lage nei eai . ” Arinai eanuana esana wa Soara .
01019023	Mahana i dalasaema’o tanoubu i sinai abotai Lota ie lage Soara eai .
01019024	Abo GUIAU we’u gigibori eo alaalasi galewa eai GUIAU arinai i hetarudobei Sodoma eo Gomara potadi eai .
01019025	Eanua ne i heasibuidi , eo gonuna maudoina i hebaaea , eanua wa taumiaidi gamagaridi hinage , eo saha tano eai se ini’ini .
01019026	Na Lota monena ia murina eai i laulau , i itasinibui , to i hemala arita we’una .
01019027	Maratomtom gagirina eai Aberahama , i sae heuheula ena abatoro eai wa GUIAU matana eai ;
01019028	ie itadobi Sodoma eo Gomara eo gonu ne tehana maudoina arinai , ie ita , eanua asuasuna i ini’inisae doha um lailai abagabugabuna asuasuna .
01019029	Arinai ede , huia eai ne Eaubada gonu ne eanuadi i hebaaeadi wa , Aberahama i nuatui , arinai Lota i hepesa bagunai heasibuina boeana eai , huiana ne eanuadi wa aridi eai Lota i miamia wa i heasibuidi .
01019030	Lota abotai Soara i laugabaei , ie sae oea tupidi eai ie mia , ma nanatunayao sisine labui , paana Soara miana i matausiei ; to we’u duhana esau eai ie mia , ma nanatunayao sisine labui .
01019031	Abo tau‐bagunana i ribalau taumuritana arinai i ene , “ Tamada i tautaubad’o , eo tanoubu eai ta nige tau esau taba arida eai i laoma , doha tanoubu ta kamanina .
01019032	Ehei , tamada hage waina ta henom , arinai abo ta eno’enoei , doha nei ada isimurita abo se tubu , tamada debana eai . ”
01019033	Arinai maionana eai ne tamadi waina se henom ; abo taubaguna ie lau , ma tamana se eno ; ia nige abina ie ata , aitea huia eai natuna ie eno , eo aitea huia eai i torohaiuio .
01019034	Mara ie ton eai taubaguna wa abo i ribalau taumurita arinai ie ene , “ U ita boni tamada maegu aie eno ; hage maiona ta waina eai ta henomuioi ; oa abo u lau maem au eno , abo ada isimurita se tubu , tamada debana eai . ”
01019035	Arinai maionana eai ne hinage tamadi waina se henomuioi ; taumurita wa ie lau ma tamana se eno ; ia nige abina ie ata aitea huia eai natuna ie eno , e aitea huia eai i torohaiuio .
01019036	Arinai abo Lota nanatunayao sisine wa taudi labui se boga , tamadi debana eai .
01019037	Taubaguna abo natuna tau i labasi , esana ie tore Moaba ; ia Moaba tataodi tamadi ede , i laoma e wau ta .
01019038	Taumurita ia hinage natuna tau i labasi , eo esana ie tore Ben‐ami ; ie Amona tataodi tamadi ede , i laoma e wau ta .
01020001	Nei eai Aberahama i torohai i lauwasi ie lau Negeba tanona eai , Kadesa eo Sura duaduaridi eai ie mia ; eo Gerara eai hinage ie mia .
01020002	Aberahama abo monena Saraha wa i ribaei i ene , “ Ia lougu ede . ” Arinai Abimeleko , Gerara edi wasawasa , i lauhetamari eo Saraha ie abi .
01020003	Na Eaubada i laoma Abimeleko arinai , enosuai eai , maiona eai , i ribalau arinai , i ene , “ U ita , oa taumate , sine ue abi wa debana eai , paana ia tau esau monena . ”
01020004	Abimeleko wa sora nige i lau sine wa arinai ; arinai i ene ; “ Guiau e , tatao nige adi giru abo u unuidi ?
01020005	Ia i heribagu , e nige’e , i ene , ‘ Lougu ina . ’ Sine wa hinage i ene , ‘ Tau ta lougu . ’ Ma nua‐duduraigu eai , eo ma nima‐aagu eai laulau ta ea abi . ”
01020006	Abo Eaubada enosuai eai i ribalau arinai i ene , “ Hedeona , ea nuatuiyao oa ma nua‐duduraim eai laulau ta ue abi , eo eau ede ea abi nuahim to nige baaea u ginauri arigu eai , arinai nige ea eari ia bena u abilau arinai .
01020007	Besi , tau wa monena u moseuioi ; paana ia peroweta , ia abo enam i lau‐uura arinai oa abo u mauri . Na ena nige u moseuioi , u nuatui mamohoi ariri abo u mate , oa maem tataoyao gamagaridi . ”
01020008	Abimeleko maratomtom eai i toro heuheula , ena heaheari tataodi gamagaridi i eogaidi , ginauri gamagaridi ta i heribadi ; ena tatao wa abo se matausi ariri .
01020009	Abimeleko abo Aberahama i eogai , i ribalau arinai i ene , “ U sahaimai ina ? Eo eau saha arinai ea hebaaeam arinai baaea lailai u leama eau eo egu basileia potamai eai ? Ginauri nige i lolo se ginauridi , arigu eai u abidi ede . ”
01020010	Abimeleko Aberahama abo i heriba i ene , “ Oa em nuatu saha , na laulau ta u hetubu ? ”
01020011	Aberahama i ene , “ Ea ginauri paana egu nuatu ea ene , Eaubada matausina ina tupo maudoina eai ta nige’e , arinai abo se unuigu monegu debana eai .
01020012	Hinage mamohoi ia lougu ede , tamagu natuna esau , na nige sinagu natuna , to i hemala eau monegu .
01020013	Huiana ne Eaubada i hetamarigu bena tamagu ena numa ea laugabaei ea elielitatausi , ea ribalau sine arinai ea ene , ‘ Teina em abataubigaigu ede , haedi ta lage abo u ribaegu u ene , ia lougu . ’ ”
01020014	Abimeleko abo mamoe eo bulumakau i abidi , eo heaheari tauauaudi eo sisinedi , i mosedi Aberahama arinai , eo monena Saraha i moseuioi arinai .
01020015	Abimeleko abo i ene , “ U ita , egu tano ede matam eai , aisega dimo u henua arinai u mia . ”
01020016	Saraha arinai i ene , “ U ita , loum wa moni tausani esega ea mosei , em taumaeamaea maisana isi gamagaridi maem wa matadi eai , eo tatao gamagaridi matadi eai oa se heduduraim’o . ”
01020017	Aberahama i lau‐uura Eaubada arinai ; Eaubada abo Abimeleko i helolouioi , monena hinage eo ena heaheari sisinedi , isi abotai merumeru se labasidi .
01020018	Paana GUIAU Abimeleko ena numa taumia sisinedi gamagaridi bogadi i he’agaridi , Saraha , Aberahama monena wa debana eai .
01021001	GUIAU ie lage Saraha arinai doha i ribaei wa , eo ena ribahesunuma hinage GUIAU ginauriwatai .
01021002	Saraha abo ie boga , eo Aberahama natuna i labasi , ia i tautaubadao , huiana eai wa Eaubada i heribayao .
01021003	Aberahama ia natuna Saraha i labasi wa , esana ie tore Isaako .
01021004	Aberahama natuna i heperitome ia ena asubena hehaligigi‐haionana eai , doha Eaubada ena lauhesom wa .
01021005	Aberahama ena borimai handere esega huiana eai ne natuna Isaako se labasi .
01021006	Na Saraha i ene , “ Eaubada egu aba maruhi i leama , aidimodi wasagu se ataiei abo se maruhi maeguyao . ”
01021007	Hinage i ene , “ Eai gonoana taba Aberahama i heriba i ene , ‘ Saraha ia abo merumeru tauhemadodi esau ? ’ Ia mo natuna ea labasiyao ia tautaubadana eai ta . ”
01021008	Merumeru wa abo ie tubu , ie lau e susu se hedabu : hedabuna asubenana eai wa Aberahama mataasi lailaina i ginauri .
01021009	Na Saraha Aigupito sinena Hagara natuna Aberahama enana i labasi wa , ie ita maena ia natuna Isaako se aiaihea ,
01021010	to i ribalau Aberahama arinai i ene , “ Heaheari sinena ta ma natuna u aiduiedi . Heaheari sinena ta natuna ia taba nige gogo tupona i abi natugu Isaako maena . ”
01021011	Riba ta Aberahama i heamna baaea , natuna wa debana eai ,
01021012	Na Eaubada Aberahama arinai ie riba i ene , “ Tabu nuam i amamna gama ta debana eai , eo em heaheari sinena debana eai . Saraha saha i ribaei u ginauri , ena riba u lauwatai , paana Isaako debana eai abo oa am isimurita esadi se ataidi .
01021013	Na heaheari sinena natuna wa ia hinage abo i hemala basileia , paana ia hinage natum . ”
01021014	Arinai maratomtom eai Aberahama i toroheula ariri falawa ie abi , eo sarai opina eai goila i hegoi , Hagara i mosei , i toresae dabayarona eai , natuna hinage , eo i hetamari ie lau . To ie lau abo i laulau gaibu Biera‐siba barabarana eai .
01021015	I lau e goila sarai opina eai wa ie ohi abo merumeru i gabadobei oeagi gagirina esau paana eai .
01021016	I tausuara begana to ie bawa , edana lohana doha pidu se tu , paana i ene , “ Nige ea henua bena merumeru matagu eai i mate . ” Ma babawasuarana merumeru arinana i helai ie dou .
01021017	Gama wa arinana Eaubada i ataiei abo Eaubada ena aneru galewa eai ie eoga Hagara arinai i ene , “ Hagara e , saha i henuadubum ta ? Tabu u matausi , Eaubada gama wa arinana i ataieyao em aba ota eai ne .
01021018	U toro gama u abisini , u abididini nimam eai , paana ia arinai abo basileia lailaina ea hetubu . ”
01021019	Abo Eaubada sine wa matana i helaladi to goila ipuna ie ita : abo ie lau sarai opina wa goila eai i hemonau , eo gama ana i mosei ie nom .
01021020	Gama wa abo i tubusae Eaubada maena ; barabara eai ie mia eo i hemala pidu tautuna esau .
01021021	Parana barabarana eai ie mia to sinana Aigupito oeana eai sine esau i woeaiama abo monena .
01021022	Huiana eai nei Abimeleko eo Pikolo ena tauiala bodadi tauwoeaidi se ribalau Aberahama arinai si ene , “ Em abiabi gamagaridi eai ea ita Eaubada maem ,
01021023	Arinai bena Eaubada esana eai enagu u riba aigora , taba nige huia esau abo abiborabora arigu eai u ginauri e nanatuguyao aridi eai , eo agu isimurita . Doha eau egu abilolo arim eai oa hinage bena em abiabi doha nei eau arigu eai , eo tano arinai u miamia ta hinage . ”
01021024	Aberahama i ene , “ Abo ea riba aigora . ”
01021025	Huiana Aberahama Abimeleko ena heaheari tataodi i hegirudi paana ana goila sarana esau se girihai .
01021026	Abimeleko i ene , “ Eau nige abina ea ata eai laulau ta i ginauri : oa nige u heribagu , eo wasana nige ea ataiei i laoma e asubena ta . ”
01021027	Arinai Aberahama mamoe eo bulumakau i abidi eo Abimeleko i mosedi , eo tataodi labui edi ribahesunuma se ginauri .
01021028	Aberahama mamoe eawoina eai mamoe nanatudiyao bawesinadi haligigi‐labui i abihesuaradi .
01021029	Abimeleko i ribalau Aberahama arinai i ene , “ Ina mamoe nanatunayao bawesinadi haligigi‐labui u abi hesuaradi ta , aniona saha ? ”
01021030	I heuio i ene , “ Ina mamoe nanatudiyao bawesinadi haligigi‐labui ta abo eau nimagu eai u abidi , abo oa enagu tauriba ede , goila huana ta eau tau sarana . ”
01021031	Arinai teha ne esana se tore Biera‐siba paana nei eai taudi labui se riba aigora .
01021032	Arinai Biera‐siba eai edi ribahesunuma se ginauri , abotai Abimeleko maena Pikolo ena iala bodana tauwoeaina wa se torohai se uio Pilistia edi tano eai .
01021033	Aberahama oeagi tabuna esau i umai Biera‐siba eai abo nei eai GUIAU esana i atai , Mauri Nige Nosina Eaubadana .
01021034	Abo Aberahama Pilistia eai ie mia asubena gamagamagari .
01022001	Ina ginauri ta muridi eai Eaubada lauita i mosei Aberahama arinai , i ribalau arinai ie ene , “ Aberahama e ! ” I riba heuio i ene , “ Eau ede ina . ”
01022002	Eaubada i ene , “ Natum u woeai , natu‐ese’esegam u gadosisie wa , Isaako , abo au lau tupo Moria eai , nei eai ia abo u moselaei em aitalasam gabugabuna oea tupina esau potana eai , sora abo ea heitam . ”
01022003	Arinai Aberahama i toroheula maratomtom gagirina eai , ena asini abageruina ie au , ana hewari labui maenayao eo natuna Isaako i woeaesegaidi ; oeagi i aitom aitalasam gabugabuna enana , abo se torohai se lau wau tupo wa Eaubada i heribayao wa arinai .
01022004	Asubena hehaionana eai Aberahama matana i helabaisinidi dimona wa ie ita eda lohaloha eai .
01022005	Abo Aberahama ena hewari i heribadi , “ Inai au mia , asini maemiu ; gama ta maegu abo ai lau nei eai ai aihelahui , abotai ai uioma arimiu eai . ”
01022006	Abo Aberahama aitalasam gabugabuna oeagina ie abi ie tore natuna tau Isaako dabayarona eai ; eo nimana eai oeagi ala’alasina eo nigo i abidi , abo taudi labui se lau esega .
01022007	Isaako i ribalau tamana arinai i ene , “ Tamagu ! ” Aberahama i heuio , i ene , “ Natugu , eau ede ina . ” I ene , “ Oeagi alaalasina ina eo oeagi augogona , na mamoe bena aitalasam gabugabuna mo haedi eai ? ”
01022008	Na Aberahama i ene , “ Natugu e , Eaubada iabom mamoe esau aitalasam gabugabuna enana abo i henonohai . ” To taudi labui se lau labulabui se lau .
01022009	Dimo wa Eaubada i ribaei wa arinai se lage , abotai Aberahama aba‐aitalasam i tarini , potana eai oeagi i hatai komakomanidi , natuna Isaako abo ie pai , eo i he’enosaei oeagi wa potadi eai .
01022010	Abotai Aberahama nimana i loloilaei nigo i abilau arinai natuna bena i unuhemate ,
01022011	na GUIAU ena aneru galewa eai i eogalau , i ene , “ Aberahama e ! Aberahama e ! ” To i heuio , “ Eau ede ina . ”
01022012	I ene , “ Nimam tabu u torelaei natum potana eai , eo tabu u sahai ; paana ea itayao ede , Eaubada u matausiei arinai natum ta , natueseesegam ta nige u nuahi arigu eai . ”
01022013	Aberahama matana i helabaisinidi , i italau , na dagelana eai mamoe tamoana ie ita donana oeagi gagirina eai se aitala’ahi : Aberahama mamoe tamoana wa i toai i toresae ena aitalasam ie gabu , natuna helaudamaina .
01022014	Arinai dimo ne esana Aberahama ie tore ‘ GUIAU enada abo i leama ’ , doha se ribaribaei i laoma e wauta , si ene , “ GUIAU ena oea‐tupina eai enada abo se leama . ”
01022015	GUIAU ena aneru ena eogahelabuina galewa eai ,
01022016	I ene , “ Eaubom enagu eai ea riba aigora , GUIAU i ribaei , paana laulau ta ue abi , to natum nige u nuahi , natueseesegam tau :
01022017	Mamohoi ariri abo ea ainauiaim , am isimurita abo ea hegamagaridi doha galewa iporadi , eo doha gelegele gabogabo hasarina eai wa . Am isimurita hinage abo adi waiunuyao edi dobila abo se tanuagaidi .
01022018	Eo oa am isimurita debadi eai tanoubu basileiadi gamagaridi abo se helolodi , paana arinagu u awaabiei . ”
01022019	Arinai Aberahama ie uio ana hewari aridi eai to se torohai se lau esega se lau Biera‐siba , Aberahama ena aba mia Biera‐siba eai .
01022020	Ina ginauri ta muridi eai Aberahama se heriba , “ Mileka hinage merumeru i labasidi em tau Nahora enana . ”
