19016009	Arinai nuagu i lolo ariri , eo earuagu i kodelamposi , taugu hinage i ota komakomani .
19016010	Paana oa taba nige u moselaegu Hade eai , eo taba nige u eari em hetabu tauna Duha lailai i ita .
19016011	Mauri dobilana oa u heiheitagu ; oa matam eai kode saesaena mo , nimatutum eai amna lolo mo , i lau e ana huia ana tasi .
19019001	Eaubada ena namanamari galewa i ribahemasaraha , eo teha ewa eai nimana paisoana i wasawasaei .
19019002	
19019003	Asubena to asubena ena riba se hetamarilaei , eo maiona to maiona ena sonoga se ribahelai .
19019004	Isi nige arinadi dagugudi , eo nige edi riba , memenadi nige dagugudi ;
19019005	ia mo arinadi ie lau tanoubu maudoina boeana eai , edi riba hinage se lau tanoubu sigana eai . Duaduaridi eai mahana ena numalulu i hetoro ,
19019006	ia doha tautawasora harihariu wa ena numa i torohaigabaei , doha tau adiadidirina ma kodena ena dobila i laulauwatai .
19019007	Ena abadalasae ede galewa tupo esau eai , i hetahetaiiri i lau e ie lage galewa sigana eai ; gigiborina arinai hinage taba nige ginauri saha i tauyamui .
19019008	GUIAU ena laugagaeo i lolo dumaduma , tau earuana i hemauriuioi ; GUIAU ena abahemasaraha ribadi mamohoidi ede , tau nuasupusupuna i hesonoga .
19019009	GUIAU ena lauheata ribadi se dudurai , tatao nuadi se hekodedi ; GUIAU ena lauhesom ie a’a esegai , tatao matadi se hemaradi .
19019010	GUIAU matausina ie a’a , i mia i lau e huia nige nosina ; GUIAU ena hesanapu ribadi mamohoidi ede , eo se dudurai ariri .
19019011	Ta henua aririedi abotai gold , gold gamagaridi lolololodi wa ; edi amna amoamo ena amna i hemuri , amoamo wa noina eai i namnamtutu .
19019012	Ribadi wa aridi eai em heaheari tauna se ribahesanapuei ; sogohidi eai ainauiana abo i lai ariri .
19019013	Aitea tau iabom ena baaea italobaina abina ie ata ? Egu laulau baaeadi eamuyamuidi aridi eai bena oa u hea’agu .
19019014	Oa em heaheari tauna ta bena nuasaesae baaeadi aridi eai u nuahi ; tabu se tanuagaigu ! Abotai abo ea toro dudurai , eo awayagara lailaina arinai taba nige edi abahegirugu .
19019015	Taba awagu ribadi eo nuagu nuanuatuna oa matam eai bena se dudurai , GUIAU e , egu we’utau , eo tau unehemaurigu .
19022001	Egu Eaubada e , egu Eaubada e , ue saha u nuagabaegu ta ? Paana saha oa eda lohaloha eai , na nige u saguigu , egu dou nige u ataiei ?
19022002	
19022003	Eaubada e , asubena huiadi eai ea dousaewa , na nige u heuio , maiona huiadi eai hinage , na nige aiawasi ea lobai .
19022004	Iamo oa tabuna ede , oa se hebawam Isaraela edi aihelahui potadi eai .
19022005	Tamamaiyao oa se sunumaem , se sunumaem arinai oa u lebohaidi .
19022006	Se doulaowa , eo se mauri ; oa se sunusunumaem , eo nige u laudobiedi .
19022007	Na eau motamota mo na nige tau ; tatao se subugu , dodoga se isuewaegu ,
19022008	Isi gamagaridi se itagu eo se alaliuliuwaegu , adi ao se hebaaeadi arigu eai , eo urudi se heodedi :
19022009	“ Ena sunuma ie tore GUIAU arinai ; besi ia i lebohai ! Hage ia i saguhai , paana ena nualolo ia arinai ! ”
19022010	Omihede oa ede sinagu bogana eai u abihaigu ; sinagu susuna eai oa u itawataigu .
19022011	Egu huia labasi eai i laoma e wauta oa u itawataigu , sinagu bogana eai i laoma e huia ta oa egu Eaubada ede .
19022012	Tabu oa eda lohaloha eai , paana huia baaea i hanahanauma , eo nige doga esau bena i saguigu .
19022013	Bulumakau tamoadi gamagaridi se torohetai’irigu ; Basana edi bulumakau adiadidiridi se torohetai’irigu ;
19022014	awadi se dabari helaidi matagu eai doha liona guriguriamdi , eo se doulailai .
19022015	Amnagu ede doha goila se hegoigabaei , eo siadagu popodi se tarumo . Nuagu doha wax nuapougu eai ie welo ;
19022016	adidirigu ie ohi , doha gulewa se oigoru , memenagu ie patu gaeagaeagu eai ; mate mua’a mua’ana eai u he’enogu .
19022017	Mamohoi kedewa se torohetai ’ irigu , tatao manamanabaradi se torohetai ’ irigu ; nimagu eo aegu se aigoridi —
19022018	siadagu gamagaridi se hasiridi — tatao wa se aiai’ewaigu eo nuadi se lolo ;
19022019	agu lulu se soiedi , eo agu lulu gamagaridi hinage se hekelerodi .
19022020	Na oa , GUIAU e , tabu u mia eda lohaloha eai , oa agu sagu ede , u heurama u saguigu !
19022021	Earuagu bena u saguhai elepa eai , kedewa edi gigibori eai hinage u abihemaurigu !
19022022	Liona awana eai u hemaurigu , bulumakau manamanabaradi donadi eai earuagu nuanuadubuna bena u saguhai !
19022023	Oa esam abo ea wasawasaei egu tataoyao aridi eai , tatao peledi boeadi eai abo ea aihelahuim :
19022024	Omi , eai to eai GUIAU au matausiei , ia au aihelahui ! Omi , Iakobo nanatunayao ia au ribapasipasiei , ia matausina nuamiu eai , omi Isaraela nanatunayao !
19022025	Paana ia tau ai’iwala ana iwala nige i isuewaei eo nige i hewaiunuei ; matana nige i toreamui arinai , na ena dou mo i ataiei .
19022026	Moutuana matadi eai abo ea hedebasaem ; egu riba aigora abo ea heduduraidi isi taumatausiem matadi eai .
19022027	Tau gogogesagesa abo se aiai , eo abo bogadi se sese . Eai to eai ia se eo’oeo’oi abo GUIAU se hedebasaei ! Bena se amna lolo i lau e nige nosina !
19022028	Tanoubu tupo gamagamagari abo se henuaisini eo abo se sinibui GUIAU arinai ; eanua gamagaridi taumiaidi abo se tabaohu ia arinai .
19022029	Paana GUIAU ia wasawasa ede , eanua gamagaridi taumiaidi ia tanuagadi eai ie lau .
19022030	Mamohoi ariri ia matana eai tanoubu taunuasaesae gamagaridi abo se tabaohui ; isi gamagaridi se hemala tanouio ia arinai abo se tabaohu , isi hinage nige abina se ata se hemauriuioidi .
19022031	Isimurita ia abo se heayaiyei ; Guiau wasana tatao adi isimurita abo se heribadi ,
19022032	ena mauri abo se wasaduaiei isi sora nige se labasidi aridi eai , ia ana paisoa ede meta .
19023001	GUIAU ia taumiataunigu doha mamoe tauitawataina ; eau taba nige saha ea deha .
19023002	Abaaibai lolodi eai i heotagu . Goila ipudi daumoridi gegesidi eai i woeaigu ;
19023003	earuagu i hemauriuioi . Laulau dudurai dobiladi eai i woeawoeaigu , iabom esana debana eai .
19023004	Ena mate gonuna masimasigirina eai ea lulau , taba nige baaea aisana ea matausiei ; paana ede oa maidagu ; em pidipidiri , eo em tu’e se henuabigagu .
19023005	Hatahata enagu ue wese agu waiunuyao matadi eai ; urugu u heyausi , egu bia i monau boriboriri .
19023006	Mamohoi , abilolo eo nuatoatoa abo se hemuriwataigu egu mauri asubenadi gamagaridi eai ; eo GUIAU ena numa eai eau abo ea miahai i lau e huia nige nosina .
19024001	Tanoubu ma ginaurina gamagarina GUIAU enana ede , tanoubu eo isi taumiaina gamagaridi hinage .
19024002	Paana ia iabom gabogabo potana eai i hetoro , eo goila ubu eai potadi eai i tore komakomani .
19024003	Eai gonoana abo i dalasae GUIAU ena oea tupina eai ? Eo eai ena eanua tabuna eai abo i toro ?
19024004	Ia wa ena nimana se a’a , eo nuana i a’a mamohoi hinage , ia wa nuana taba nige i sae ginauri borabora arinai , eo nige i aigora borabora .
19024005	Ia GUIAU ena ainauia lolona abo i abi , eo nige abahegiruna ena mauri Eaubadana matana eai .
19024006	Ia tau eo’oina isina adi ao ede ina , Iakobo ena Eaubada matana taueo’oina wa .
19024007	Urumiu au lauisinidi , omi gana dobilamiu e ! Omi se lauisinimiu , gudu lailaimiu beabeamiu e ! Namanamari Wasawasana bena i lusorama !
19024008	Wau namanamari Wasawasana wa eai ? GUIAU ede , ma adidirina , ma gigiborina , GUIAU ia iala eai i gigibori wa !
19024009	Urumiu au lauisinidi , omi gana dobilamiu e ! Omi se lauisinimiu , gudu lailaimiu beabeamiu e ! Namanamari Wasawasana bena i lusorama !
19024010	Namanamari Wasawasana wa ia ede eai ? Tauiala tataodi moutuadi GUIAUNA , ia ede namanamari Wasawasana !
19025001	GUIAU e , earuagu ea lauisini oa arim eai .
19025002	Egu Eaubada e , egu sunuma ea tore’esegai oa arim eai , tabu se hetaumaeamaeagu agu waiunuyao tabu se saepoigu .
19025003	Hedeomi , eai to eai se bagibagilaoa oa arim eai taba nige se taumaeamaea , na isi mo dodoga manamanabaradi i lolo isi se hetaumaeamaeadi .
19025004	GUIAU e , em laulau bena u heitagu ; em dobila bena u heatagu .
19025005	Em riba mamohoina bena arinai u woeaigu , eo u heatagu , paana oa egu mauri Eaubadana ede . Asubena lohaloha eai oa ea bagibagiem .
19025006	GUIAU e , em nuatoatoa tabu u nuahuiei , eo em gadosisi miatahitahina , mumuga eai ie mia i lau e nige nosina .
19025007	Hewarigu laulaudi baabaaeadi tabu u henuaisinidi , e egu awayagara ; oa em gadosisi miatahitahina mo arinai abo u nuatuigu , em abilolo debana eai , GUIAU e !
19025008	GUIAU i lolo eo i dudurai ; arinai tatao baabaaeadi dobila i heitadi .
19025009	Tau nuatudobidobiuioina dobila duduraina arinai i woeai , eo tau nuatudobidobiuioina ia ena eda i heata .
19025010	GUIAU ena abiabi gamagaridi aridi eai gadosisi miatahitahina eo riba hemamohoiena i hemasarahadi , isi , eai to eai ena ribahesunuma eo ena riba tabudi se sogohididinidi .
19025011	Oa esam debana eai , GUIAU e , egu baaea giruna bena u ribagigiri , paana ie lai .
19025012	Aitea tau ia GUIAU i matausiei ? ia abo i heata aisega dobila bena i hineri .
19025013	Ia abo i mia komakomani , taba nige saha i deha , eo nanatunayao edi tano abo se abi isi enadi .
19025014	GUIAU ena awa’eha i mosei isi ia se matausiei aridi eai ena ribahesunuma hinage i hemasaraha aridi eai .
19025015	Matagu huia gamagari ea tusaei GUIAU arinai , aegu sai’i eai abo i abihaidi .
19025016	U sinibuima , eo u nuatoatoaegu , paana ede eaubom , nige agu sagu , eo ea amnabaaea .
19025017	Nuagu ena amamna bena u laehesuara eo egu nuadubu eai bena u abiisinigu .
19025018	Egu nuadubu eo agu iwala bena u nuatui , eo egu baaea gamagamagaridi bena u ribagigiridi .
19025019	Agu waiunu gamagamagaridi bena u nuatuidi , edi hewaiunu hinage arigu eai i karapi ariri .
19025020	Nuagu u itawatai , eo u saguhaigu ; tabu se hetaumaeamaeagu , paana egu abadago ede oa .
19025021	Egu miamia a’a eo egu laulau dudurai bena se ganaganaigu , paana ea bagibagilaoa oa arim eai .
19025022	GUIAU e , Isaraela ena lauita gamagaridi aridi eai oa bena u unehai .
19027001	GUIAU ia egu mara eo egu abamauri ede ; eai abo ea matausiei ? GUIAU ia egu mauri ena iala bonana ede ; eai matausina abo ea matausi ?
19027002	Ena tatao manamanabaradi se ialaigu eo se aipate bena se unuigu , agu waiunu eo isi tau hebaaeagu , abo se alabesibesi eo abo se beu .
19027003	Taba iala tataodi gamagaridi se hetaiirigu , taba nige aruagu i loi ; taba hinage se ialaigu , nuagu taba nige se hemoiu .
19027004	Ginauri esega dumaduma GUIAU arinai ea aibodai , abo hinage ea eo’owatai : ia ede bena GUIAU ena numa eai ea miamia egu mauri asubenadi gamagaridi eai , GUIAU ana ao lolo dumadumana bena eai itaitai , eo bena ena dubu alona eai ea aiaibodalau .
19027005	Paana ede huia baaea eai ena abaailogulogu eai abo i toreamuigu ; ena apa birigomna eai abo i buburigu , ia abo i abiisinigu we’utau saesaena potana eai i toregu .
19027006	Abotai eau urugu abo se lauisini agu waiunuyao se toro hetaiirigu ea saetawatawaidi , arinai ena numa lulu eai aitalasam abo ea gabudi ma wowogu ; abo ea wana , eo GUIAU abo ea aihelahui !
19027007	GUIAU e , ena ea eoga lailai bena u ataatai ! Em abilolo bena u hemasara arigu eai , eo u heuioegu !
19027008	U ribaeyao u ene , “ Matagu u eo’oi . ”  Nuagu i heuioem , i ene , “ GUIAU e , matam abo ea eo’oi . ”
19027009	Tabu matam u woeoi arigu eai . Em heaheari tauna tabu u aiduiei ma ouyalayalam , tau saguigu ede oa . Tabu u gabahesuaragu , tabu u nuagabaegu , abihemaurigu Eaubadana e !
19027010	Taba tamagu eo sinagu se otaotaegu wa , GUIAU abo i abi’isinigu .
19027011	Oa em dobila u heatagu , GUIAU e , abalau masamasarahana eai u woeaigu agu waiunuyao debadi eai .
19027012	Tabu u buigabaegu agu waiunu edi henuhenua aridi eai , paana tauribaribataubiga tataodi se toro bena se hebaaeagu , isi hinage heamamna laulaudi eahuadi eai .
19027013	Ea awamamohoiei GUIAU ena abilolo abo ea ita tatao maumauridi edi eanua eai .
19027014	GUIAU u laubagibagiei ; u adidiri , eo u nuakipikipi , hedeomi , GUIAU u laubagibagiei .
19031001	GUIAU e , egu abahomo ede oa , taba nige se hetaumaeamaeagu , nige ariariri ; em laulau dudurai debana eai bena u lebohaigu !
19031002	
19031003	U ataatailaoma arigu eai , u heurama u saguhaigu ! Oa bena egu ababawayamui we’una , egu abamia adiadidirina abo arinai ea mauri !
19031004	Mamohoi oa egu we’utau eo egu abamia adidirina ; esam debana eai bena u woeaigu eo u eda bagunaegu .
19031005	Siposipo se abinonoha eamuyamui enagu , bena arinai u eairihaigu , paana egu abahomo ede oa .
19031006	Earuagu ta ea leawa oa nimam eai , GUIAU e , Eaubada mamohoina , oa u unehaiguo .
19031007	Aidimodi oitau borabora se nuanuatuidi oa u hewaiunuedi ; na eau GUIAU mo ea sunumaei .
19031008	Abo ea kode ariri eo nuagu i lolo oa em gadosisi miatahitahina debana eai , paana egu amamna u itayao , egu lauita oa u nuatuidio ,
19031009	na nige u moselaegu waiunu nimana eai , aegu mo u hetorodi eanua magamagagana eai .
19031010	GUIAU e , bena u nuatoatoaegu , paana ea ai’iwala ; matagu i beruberuo nuadubu debana eai , nuagu eo taugu hinage .
19031011	Paana nuadubu egu mauri i abiheohi , eo egu borimai gamagaridi eai hinage ea aiai’iwala . Egu adidiri ie ohi nuadubu debana eai , siadagu hinage se meimei .
19031012	Ea hemala agu waiunuyao edi abaalaliuliuwa , helegu‐tau‐mia‐tataodi edi abamatamatausi , egu dodogayao edi abatabutabubu ; aidobudi dobila eai se itagu abo se dagogabaegu .
19031013	Se nuahuiegu doha tau matematena , agu ao doha gulewa tamotamogoruna .
19031014	Agueamoisa , monumonunu gamagaridi ea ataiedi — tupo gamagari eai matausi lailai ! — Se oioiribagogo bena se hebaaeagu , se nuatueamuyamui bena se unuigu .
19031015	Na , GUIAU e , egu sunuma ede oa arim eai , ea ene , “ Oa egu Eaubada ede . ”
19031016	Egu mauri asubenadi gamagaridi ede oa nimam eai ; agu waiunuyao , eo tauheamamnagu nimadi eai bena oa u saguhaigu !
19031017	Bena am ao u hesina em heaheari tauna potana eai ; em gadosisi miatahitahina arinai bena u abihemaurigu !
19031018	Tabu se hetaumaemaeagu GUIAU e , paana ea eogasaewa arim eai . Isi mo tatao manamanabaradi bena se hetaumaeamaeadi , bena se hetagugudi , eo se laedi Hade eai .
19031019	Sopa boraboradi bena se unauna , aidobu tatao laulaududurai se ribahebaaeadi , nuasaesae eo isuewa debana eai .
19031020	Em abilolo i lai ariariri u nonohai isi taumatausiem enadi , eo isi eai to eai se ailogulogu oa arim eai tatao matadi eai !
19031021	Oa nuanuam eai u hebawayamuidi tatao edi nuatu hebahebaaea aridi eai ; logulogum eai u ganaganaidi arina baaea aridi eai .
19031022	GUIAU abo se ribahelolo , paana ena gadosisi otaotahaina i hemasaraha enagu huiana ne lauita lailai ea hearo gonogonoana doha eanua se ialai .
19031023	Ma nuaberuberugu ea ene , “ Oa matam eai se henauhesuaragu ! ” Na oa egu awanori u ataiei huiana ne ea eogalaowa bena u saguigu .
19031024	GUIAU au gadosisiei , omi tau miatahitahina ! GUIAU tausunumaena i ganahetai’iridi na taunuasaesae ena maisa i heporohe aririei .
19031025	Au adidiri , eo hinage au nuakipikipi , Omi gamagarimiu , GUIAU taulaubagibagiena !
19032001	Tau wa ena awayagara se ribagigiri , ena baaea se bubulitawai , ia ie kode !
19032002	Tau wa nige ana giru GUIAU matana eai , earuana eai nige abiborabora , ia ie kode hinage !
19032003	Huiana ne egu baaea nige ea hemasaraha , taugu se porohe ariri , asubena maudoina ea lepalepa .
19032004	Asubena to maiona nimam potagu eai i porohe ariri , egu adidiri ie ohi , doha siwaro lailai eai gigibori huiana eai .
19032005	Oa arim eai egu beaea ea hemasaraha , eo egu ponori nige ea toreamui ; ea ene , “ Egu awayagara wa abo ea ribahemasaraha GUIAU arinai , ” abotai egu baaea giruna u ribagigiri .
19032006	Arinai isi nuadi se ota esegai taba gamagaridi se uura arim eai ; huia baaea eai , abaita ena huia didi eai , isi taba nige se hearo .
19032007	Oa egu ababawayamui ede , piripiri aridi eai u ganahetaiirigu , aridi eai u lebohaigu .
19032008	Abo ea heatam , em dobila abo ea heitam arinai bena u lau ; abo ea lauhasahasaim , matagu ede oa potam eai .
19032009	Oa tabu em abi doha hosi e doha mule , isi nige edi sibasiba ; arinai se paidi , eo awadi eai abawoeawoeaidi se heapudidinidi bena abo se awa’abiem .
19032010	Tau laulau gewagewa ena nua’amamna se gamagari ariri , na gadosisi miatahitahina GUIAU tausunumaena abo i hetaiiri .
19032011	Au kode GUIAU arinai , eo nuamiu se lolo , omi dudurai tataomiu e , au eoga lailai , omi nuamiu se dudurai e !
19033001	Au kode ariri GUIAU arinai , omi taulaulau dudurai ! Tau dudurai i lolo i aiaihelahui .
19033002	Huelele arinai GUIAU au aihelahui , huelele mainadi saudoudoi aridi eai enana au oioini !
19033003	Wana harihariuna enana au wanai , au oi‐huelele komakomani ma arina lailaimiu !
19033004	Paana GUIAU ena riba i dudurai ; eo ana paisoa maudoina ie abi ma nuapai’ipai’ina .
19033005	I’ila lolo eo laulau dudurai i gadosisiedi ; GUIAU ena gadosisi miatahitahina tanoubu i hemonau .
19033006	GUIAU ena riba arinai galewa tehana se hetubu , eo ena ginauri gamagaridi ia awana eahuana arinai .
19033007	Gabogabo goilana i pei’esegai tupo esega eai , gabogabo ena aba ota eai ie tore .
19033008	Tanoubu maudoina bena GUIAU se matausiei , tanoubu taumiaina ia bena se tabutabubuei !
19033009	Paana ia ie riba , to ia ede : i lauhesom , abo i taumasaraha .
19033010	GUIAU eanua gamagaridi taumaiaidi edi sonoga i itasubudi ; tatao bodadi edi nuanuatu i guduguduidi .
19033011	GUIAU ena ribahesanapu i otaesegai i lau e nige nosina , ia ena nuatu se miatahitahi isi gamagaridi aridi eai .
19033012	Eanua taumiaidi wa se kode ariri taba edi Eaubada ede GUIAU , tatao wa isi i hileidio iabom enanayao .
19033013	GUIAU galewa eai i itadobima , tanoubu tataodi gamagaridi i itadi .
19033014	Ena ababawa telona potana eai i italau tanoubu taumiaina gamagaridi aridi eai ,
19033015	ia wa gamagaridi nuadi ia i hetubudi , eo edi laulau gamagaridi i itasipoidi .
19033016	Wasawasa esau ena tauiala gamagaridi taba nige se hemauri ; tauiala nuakipikipina iabom ena adidiri lailaina eai taba nige i mauri .
19033017	Iala hosina taba nige i saepoi , eo ena adidiri lailaina eai taba nige i hemauri .
19033018	Mamohoi GUIAU matana ie lau eai tau matausiena arinai , eo eai to eai ia ena gadosisi otaotahaina se sunumaei ,
19033019	bena earuadi mate eai abo i saguhaidi , eo guriam huiana eai abo i abihemauridi .
19033020	Earuada GUIAU se laubagibagiei , ia ada sagu eo eda opea ede .
19033021	Mamohoi , nuada se kode ia arinai , paana ia esana tabuna ta sunusunumaei .
19033022	GUIAU e , em gadosisi miatahitahina bena i ota ai potamai eai , paana ai ema sunuma ede oa arim eai .
19034001	Huia gamagari GUIAU ea ribatausaei ; aihelahuina awagu eai taba nige i lautom .
19034002	
19034003	Nuagu ena abaribapasipasi ede GUIAU ; taunuatudobidobiuio abo se ataiei , eo se kode .
19034004	Omi maeguyao GUIAU ta ribahelai , eo esana ta hedebasae gogo !
19034005	Eau GUIAU ea eo’oi to i ataiegu , egu matausi gamagaridi boeadi eai i earihaigu .
19034006	Au italau ia arinai abo au nuawoiwoina ; abo ami ao taba nige se taumaeamaea .
19034007	Gogogesagesa tauna ta ie eoga , to GUIAU ia i ataiei , eo ena amamna gamagaridi aridi eai i hemauri .
19034008	GUIAU ena aneru ia tau matausina tataodi i miahetaiiridi eo baaea eai i saguhaidi .
19034009	Omi hage au ai’ita , abo au italobai GUIAU i lolo ede ! Tausunusunumaena abo nuana i kode !
19034010	GUIAU au heasisiei , omi hetabu tataomiu e , paana ia tauheasisiena taba nige ena deha .
19034011	Liona nanatudiyao se dabu to se guriam , na isi GUIAU tau eo’oina tataodi taba nige ginauri esa lolona se abisapuri .
19034012	Merumeru tatao e , au laoma au ataatai arigu eai , GUIAU heasisina eau abo ea heatamiu .
19034013	Aitea tau mauri i henua eo i henua ena mauri asubenadi bena se gamagari , bena lolo amnana i ataiei ?
19034014	Oa memenam u abididini tabu u riba baaea , sopam hinage borabora ribadi tabu se ribaedi .
19034015	Laulau gewagewa u tausuaraei , laulau lolo mo u laulauei ; loni u eo’oi , eo u miawatai .
19034016	GUIAU matana se italau laulau dudurai tataodi aridi eai , eo beana se tasoe edi eoga aridi eai .
19034017	GUIAU ana ao i laeudoiei laulau gewagewa tataodi aridi eai , abahenuaisinidi tanoubu eai i tomgabaedio .
19034018	Laulau dudurai tataodi ena se eoga GUIAU i ataiedi , edi piripiri gamagaridi eai ia i saguhaidi .
19034019	Ena tatao se nuaberuberu GUIAU i hanahanauidi , isi nuadi se tamogorugoru ia i hemauridi .
19034020	Laulau dudurai tauna piripiri gamagaridi i hearodi , na gamagaridi boeadi eai GUIAU i saguhai .
19034021	Ia siadana gamagaridi GUIAU i itawataidi ; taba nige esau i tagodu .
19034022	Laulau gewagewa tauna baaea eai abo se unuheboso , eo isi laulau dudurai tataodi tauhewaiunuedi abo se ribahematedi .
19034023	GUIAU ena heaheari tataodi abo i unehaidi , isi wa taubawayamui ia arinai , taba nige esau se ribahemate .
19037001	Tabu nuam eai u hemodeuioim laulau baaea tataodi debadi eai , laulau ponori tataodi hinage tabu u aiaromagigiriedi !
19037002	Paana nige baeaona abo se wowoea doha lagau , eo se kokoeagi doha ginauri iniinidi .
19037003	GUIAU mo au sunumaei , laulau lolodi mo au laulauedi , arinai emi oea eai abo au mia , ma nuatarumiu .
19037004	U hekodeuioim GUIAU arinai , eo oa nuam ena henuhenua ia abo i leawa .
19037005	Em dobila GUIAU nimana eai u tore ; ia u sunumaei , abo hinage i paisoa .
19037006	Em laulau dudurai abo i hemasaraha doha mara , eo am ao duduraina doha asuasubenalai .
19037007	U heaiyawasiuioim GUIAU matana eai , eo u bagibagi ma nuapai’ipai’im ; tabu nuam i mode paana esau ena dobila i lau lolo , ia laulau baaea wa i hetuhetubudi .
19037008	Ouyalaya u helautom , eo nuaheura i otawa ! Tabu hinage u nuamodemode , ata u hebaaea’uioim .
19037009	Mata paana laulau baaea tataodi abo se tomgabaedi ; na isi GUIAU ena nuatu se bagiwatai tanoubu abo se abi isi enadi .
19037010	Huia ku’uku’u mo eo laulau gewagewa tauna abo i tauyamui , taba ena eanua eai se eo’oeo’oi , ia nei eai nige’e .
19037011	Na manabiga tataodi tanoubu abo se abi isi enadi , ainauia lailai hinage abo se hearo eo arinai abo se kode .
19037012	Tau laulau gewagewa i nuatu nonohai bena tau laulau dudurai i heamamna , eo hinage ia arinai moana i taburueahisi ;
19037013	na Guiau tau baaea i marumaruhiei , paana ie ita ena huia i laolaoma .
19037014	Tau laulau gewagewa elepa i niusihai , pidu hinage ie tu , bena gogogesagesa tauna i laudobei eo laulau dudurai tataodi bena i unuidi ;
19037015	edi elepa abo i soralau isi isibom nuadi eai , edi pidu abo se hetagodudi .
19037016	Tau dudurai ena gogo begana mo , i lolo ariri abotai laulau gewagewa tataodi edi gogo lailai didigadi .
19037017	Paana tau gewagewa nimana abo se godudi , na GUIAU taududurai abo i abiisini .
19037018	Tatao nige abahegirudi GUIAU edi huia abina i atao , edi gogo hinage abo se ota i lau e nige nosina .
19037019	Huia piripiri eai taba nige se hetaumaeamaeadi , guriam asubenana eai hinage adi aiai abo i lai ariri .
19037020	Na tatao baabaaeadi abo se tomgabaedi GUIAU ana waiunuyao isi doha oea liasina , se tauyamui — doha asuasu se tautauyamui ariri .
19037021	Tau laulau gewagewa ginauri i sagesagenai , na taba nige i hemaisauioi , na tau laulau dudurai ena abi se lolo , to i aiainauia ;
19037022	isi GUIAU i nualoloedi abo oea se abi enadi , na isi i ribahematedi abo se tomgabaedi .
19037023	Tau lolo ena abalau GUIAU i nuatu nonohai , eo tau wa i nualolo arinai , abo i hetoro komakomani ;
19037024	taba ie beu , taba nige i lau ariri , paana GUIAU i abilau nimana eai .
19037025	Egu huia hewari eai i laoma e egu huia tautaubada , sora nige taududurai ea ita se nuagabaei , e nanatunayao falawa se aiaiboda .
19037026	Ia huia gamagari i aiainauiasom , eo ia arinai se sagesagena . eo nanatunayao hinage tatao se henualoloedi .
19037027	Baaea u torohaigabaei , lolo mo u abiwatai , arinai abo u miatahitahi i lau e nige nosina .
19037028	Paana GUIAU abi dudurai mo i gadosisisiei ; ena tau miatahitahi tataodi taba nige i nuagabaedi . Tau dudurai abo se ganaganai i lau e nige nosina , na tau gewagewa nanatunayao abo se tomgabaedi .
19037029	Tau dudurai abo oea i abi enana , eo abo arinai i mia i lau e nige nosina .
19037030	Tau dudurai awana eai riba sonoga i hepesadi , memenana abi dudurai i ribaribaedi .
19037031	Ena GUIAU ena laugagaeo ia nuana eai ; ena abalau eai taba nige i utusagigi .
19037032	Tau gewagewa tau dudurai i itasipoi , eo i aipate bena i unui .
19037033	GUIAU taba nige i abigabaei ia nimana gigiborina eai , eo abahedudurai eai taba nige se hegiru .
19037034	GUIAU u bagibagiei , eo ena dobila u abididini , ia hinage abo i abiisinim , eanua abo oa enam ; tau laulau gewagewa tauna abo u ita se tomgabaei .
19037035	Tau laulau gewagewa ea ita i gigibori ariri , i sae ariri doha Lebanona maruwaina esau .
19037036	Huia esau ea baeawa ea lau , na hedeomi , ia nei eai nige’e , ea eo’oi komakomani , na taba nige ea lobai .
19037037	Tau nige abahegiruna u italau arinai , eo tau dudurai u ita , manabiga tauna abo ana isimurita .
19037038	Na tau awayagara abo se unuidi , adi isi murita abo se tomgabaedi .
19037039	Tatao duduraidi edi mauri abo se abi GUIAU arinai , huia baea eai edi abahomo ede ia arinai .
19037040	GUIAU i saguidi eo i lebohaidi , laulau gewagewa tataodi nimadi eai i lebohaidi eo i hemauridi , paana edi abaailogulogu ede ia arinai .
19042001	Doha suisui nuura goila dididi i gadohiedi , eau hinage , Eaubada e , earuagu i gadohiem .
19042002	
19042003	Earuagu i gadomagu Eaubada arinai , Eaubada maumaurina arinai . Aitea huia abo ea laoma Eaubada ana ao abo ea ita ?
19042004	Agu aiai esega ede matasulugu asubena to maiona , eo tatao huia gamagari se hesiolaoma , “ Em Eaubada ia haedi‐eai ? ”
19042005	Ina ginauri ta ea henuaisini huiana wa nuagu ea soeauri ; tatao bodadi maeguyao ea woeaidi , se hemuriwataigu Eaubada ena numa eai , aie wowo ma kodemai , eo aie wana ma lautoimai , moutuana lailai ai mataasi gogo .
19042006	Earuagu e , paana saha u nuadobidobi , eo paana saha nuaboeagu eai u heunaboisaha ? Eaubada u sunumaei ; paana ia abo ea hedebasaeuioi , ia agu sagu ede
19042007	eo egu Eaubada . Earuagu i porohe ariri nuaboeagu eai arinai abo oa ea nuanuatuim , Ioridana eo Heremona eanuadi eai , Misara oea tupina eai hinage .
19042008	Gabotum i eogalau gabotum esau arinai , em goila edi abadidi lailaidi dagugudi eai ; em bagodu eo em butubutu gamagaridi se heputuhaigu .
19042009	Asubena huiana eai GUIAU ena gadosisi miatahitahina i leama ; eo maiona eai enana ea wawana , ea lauuura egu mauri Eaubadana arinai .
19042010	Ea ribalau Eaubada arinai ia egu we’utau , “ Paana saha u nuahuiegu ta ? Paana saha ea nuanuadubu , waiunu ena hebahebaaea debana eai ? ”
19042011	Agu waiunuyao edi hesom i hemala doha bonu lailai taugu eai , huia gamagamagari se ribalaoma si ene , “ Em Eaubada haedi ? ”
19042012	Earuagu e , paana saha u nuadobidobi , eo paana saha nuaboeagu eai u heunaboisaha ? Eaubada u sunumaei ; paana ia abo ea hedebasaeuioi , ia agu sagu ede , eo egu Eaubada .
19043001	Egu laulau dudurai u hemasaraha , Eaubada e , eo enagu u toro ganamuri tataodi matadi eai ; ao borabora eo laulau gewagewa tataodi nimadi eai u lebohaigu !
19043002	Paana oa Eaubada egu aba ailogulogu ede ; paana saha u gabahesuaragu ? Paana saha ea nuadubu waiunu ena hebahebaaea debana eai ?
19043003	Em mara eo em riba mamohoina bena u hetamaridima bena abo se woeaigu , abo se woeaigu em oea tupi tabuna eo em abamia arinai !
19043004	Murina eai abo ea lau Eaubada ena aitalasam hatahatana arinai , Eaubada egu abanuawoiwoina ; eo abo ea aihelahuim huelele arinai , Eaubada e , egu Eaubada .
19043005	Earuagu e , paana saha u nuadobidobi paana saha nuaboeagu eai u heunaboisaha ? Eaubada u sunumaei , paana ia abo ea hedebasaeuioi , ia agu sagu ede eo egu Eaubada .
19046001	Eaubada ia eda aba homo eo eda adidiri ede , tausaguheulaida baaea huiadi eai .
19046002	
19046003	Arinai taba nige ta matausi taba tanoubu ana ao ie bui , taba oea tupidi gabogabo nuanuana eai se tabutabubu ,
19046004	taba butubutu dagugudi se lai ma puropurodi , eo taba oea tupidi se tabutabubu dagugu lailaina wa debana eai .
19046005	Goila esau i dididi abo Eaubada ena eanua i hekode , Saesae Aririna ena aba mia tabuna meta .
19046006	Eaubada ia duaduarina eai , ia taba nige se hemoiu , Eaubada ia abo i saguheulai .
19046007	Etene se sagasagari , eanua udoi udoi se eoeo ; arinana ie tore , na tanoubu ie welo .
19046008	Tauiala moutuana GUIAUNA ia maeda , Iakobo ena Eaubada ita eda aba homo !
19046009	Au laoma GUIAU ena paipaisoa au itadi , iabom i ginauridi tanoubu eai :
19046010	Iala i helautomdi i lau e tanoubu sigana ; welolo gigidi i hetagodudi , eo alahia i godudi , kariota oeagi eai i gabudi !
19046011	“ Au monou , eo abina au ata eau mo Eaubada , Eau mo se lauisinigu eanua tataodi boeadi eai , Eau mo se lauisinigu tanoubu eai ! ”
19046012	Tauiala moutuana GUIAUNA ia maeda , Iakobo ena Eaubada ita eda abahomo ede !
19050001	Eaubada GUIAU , Gigiborina , i ribariba , eo tanoubu i eogalau arinai , mahana ena huia dalasae , i lau e ena huia dui .
19050002	Siona , ana ao lolo dumadumana eai , Eaubada ena mara i hesinalaei .
19050003	Eda Eaubada i laolaoma , taba nige i monou , ia matana eai doha oeagi i alabalebalelem , mana lailai didigana ia i lauhetaiiri .
19050004	I eogasae galewa ewana eai eo tanoubu eai hinage , bena ena tataoyao abo i heduduraidi .
19050005	“ Tausunusunumaegu au heoigogoidima , isi aitalasam arinai edi aigora arigu eai se ginauri wa ! ”
19050006	Galewa ia ena laulau dudurai se hemasaraha paana Eaubada iabom tauheduhedudurai ede !
19050007	“ Egu tataoyao e , au ataatai abo ea ribariba , Isaraela e , emi baaea abo ea ribahemasaraha ! Eau Eaubada ede , emi Eaubada .
19050008	Emi aitalasam debadi eai taba nige ea hegirumiu ; emi aitalasam gabugabudi matagu eai huia gamagamagari .
19050009	Bulumakau tamoana emi numa eai taba nige ea nuatui , goti tamoana emi gana eai hinage nige’e .
19050010	Paana nuura suisuidi gamagaridi eau enaguyao ede , bulumakau hinage oea tupidi tausani potadi eai .
19050011	Galewa manudi gamagaridi hinage abidi ea ata’o , eo ginauri maumauridi gamagamagaridi oea eai isi eau enaguyao ede .
19050012	“ Ena ea guriam , taba nige ea heribamiu ; paana tanoubu maena ginauri gamagaridi eau enaguyao ede .
19050013	Bulumakau bulumana eau ea aiaini , e nige’e ? Goti osinana hinage ea nomnomi , e nige’e ?
19050014	Lautoi aitalasamna au heaitalasam Eaubada arinai , eo emi aigora au hemamohoiedi Saesae‐Aririna arinai ;
19050015	huia baaea eai abo au eogalaoma eau hinage abo ea lebohaimiu , eo omi abo au hedebasaegu . ”
19050016	Na laulau gewagewa tataodi aridi eai Eaubada i ribalau , i ene : “ Ami paisoa saha na egu lauhesom au hasihasiridi , eo egu ribahesunuma au abi sopamiu eai ?
19050017	Paana heduhedudurai au hewaiunuei , eo egu riba au gabaedi dagelamiu eai .
19050018	Taba tauaiyahari au ita , au awaehalau arinai , tauganaganawari hinage maemiuyao au heboriesegaimiu .
19050019	“ Awam u moselaei riba gewagewa arinai , memenam eai hinage u riba borabora .
19050020	Ue bawa na em tau u ribahebaaea , sinam tahunuana natuna tau u ribahebaaea .
19050021	Ina laulau ta u laulauedi , na eau ea monou ; u ene bena eau gonogonoana doha oa . Abotai ea ribasuuim , eo giru wa ea tore oa matam eai .
19050022	“ Ina ta au nuanuatui , omi aidobu Eaubada au nuahuiei , ata ea purisimiu , na nige esau bena i toro i saguhaimiu !
19050023	Eai to eai lautoi i leama , ia ena heasisi enagu i hemasaraha ; eai to eai ena dobila i hedudurai ia arinai Eaubada ena abihemauri abo ea hemasaraha . ”
19051001	Eaubada e , u nuatoatoaegu em gadosisi miatahitahina debana eai , em nuatoatoa lailai didigana debana eai egu awayagara bena u saugabaedi .
19051002	
19051003	
19051004	Girugu bena u deurigabaei eo egu baaea arinai oa bena u hea’agu !
19051005	Paana egu awayagara abidi ea ata’o , eo egu baaea hinage huia gamagari eau matagu eai i totoro .
19051006	Oa , oabom , ea hebaaeam , saha i baaea oa matam eai , meta ea ginauriyao , arinai em riba se dudurai ariri , eo em hesanapu ribana nige abahegiruna .
19051007	Mamohoi baaea boeana eai se labasigu , eo baaea eai hinage sinagu i abigu .
19051008	Hedeomi , oa u henua bena ao mamohoi eau nuagu eai ; arinai nuagu eamuyamuina eai bena sonoga oa u heatagu .
19051009	Hyssop arinai u hea’agu , eau hinage abo arinai ea a’a ; oa u deurigu , abo ea posiposi ariri abotai snow .
19051010	Kode eo nualolo arinai oa u hemonaugu ; siada wa oa u hetagodudi abo se kodelamposi .
19051011	Egu baaea bena u hetauyamuidi oa matam eai , agu giru gamagarina bena u saugabaei .
19051012	Eaubada e , nua a’a oa u hetubu eau nuagu eai , earua harihariuna eo duduraina u tore nuaboeagu eai .
19051013	Oa matam eai tabu u gabahesuaragu eo em Earua Tabuna tabu u abihai arigu eai .
19051014	Em abihemauri kodena bena oa u leamauioi , eo earua awaabina bena i bouisinigu .
19051015	Abotai tauawayagara em laulau abo ea heatadi , eo tatao baabaaeadi abo se sinibui oa arim eai .
19051016	Eaubada e , osina giruna arinai bena oa u saguhaigu , oa Eaubada egu mauri paana , eo memenagu oa em abihemauri abo i wana helai .
19051017	Guiau e , sopagu oa u dabaridi , eo awagu aihelahuim abo i hemasaraha .
19051018	Paana aitalasam taba nige oa i hekodem ; ena aitalasam gabugabuna ea leawa , taba nige nuam i lolo .
19051019	Aitalasam esega wa Eaubada i henua aririei iaede nua tamotamogoruna , nua tamotamogoruna , dobidobina , Eaubada e , taba nige u isuewaei .
19051020	Em nualolo debana eai Siona bena oa u helolo ; Ierusalema ganana abo u hetorouioidi ,
19051021	abotai aitalasam duduraidi debadi eai abo u nuawoiwoina , aitalasam gabugabudi eo aitalasam gabugabudi maudoidi ; bulumakau abo se heaitalasamdi em aitalasam hatahatana eai .
19057001	Eaubada e , u nuatoatoaegu , u nuatoatoaegu ta , paana oa arim eai earuagu abo i ailogulogu ; mabem logulogudi eai abo ea ailogulogu , i lau e sabom i lau’o .
19057002	
19057003	Ea eogalau Eaubada Saesae Aririna arinai , Eaubada arinai ia wa ena nuatu enagu i hemamohoiei .
19057004	Galewa eai abasaguigu ia abo i hetamariama eo abo i hemaurigu , aidobu bena se ututawaigu abo i hetaumaeamaeadi . Eaubada ena gadosisi miatahitahina , eo ena riba hemamohoiena abo i hetamarilaei !
19057005	Liona boeadi eai ea laulauota , isi se lelehi ariri bena tatao se aidi , moadi ede alahia eo pidu , memenadi alahia matamatadi ede .
19057006	Eaubada e , oa abo u sae ariariri galewa ewana eai ! Em namanamari tanoubu bena i hemonau !
19057007	Hiana se gala nonohai aegu adi , ea nuaporohe ariri . Duha se sara eau egu dobila eai na isi , isibom se beudobi alona eai .
19057008	Eaubada e , nuagu i otaesegai , nuagu i ota esegai . Abo ea wana eo salamo aridi eai abo ea hedebasaei !
19057009	Earuagu , u enotoro ! Baubau eo huelele , au enotoro ! Mara i uiari abo ea hanoi !
19057010	Guiau e , abo ea lautoiem , etene boeadi eai : aihelahuim abo ea wanaidi hari eanua tataodi boeadi eai .
19057011	Paana em gadosisi miatahitahina ie sae doha galewa , am ao otaotahaina ie sae doha eada .
19057012	Eaubada e , oa abo u sae ariariri galewa ewana eai ! Em namanamari tanoubu bena i hemonau !
19062001	Eaubada iabom earuagu i laubagibagiei ma monomonougu ; ia arinai egu mauri i laolaoma .
19062002	
19062003	Ia iabom egu we’utau eo egu abamauri ede , egu numa adiadidirina ; taba nige se hemoiugu , nige ariariri .
19062004	I lau e aitea huia abo tau au aipatei au oiheguri , omi gamagarimiu e , bena ia doha bilibili eoueouna , e gana beruberuna ?
19062005	Edi nuatu esega mo ede bena ena abatoro eai se oiheguri . Ao borabora se henua aririei . Awadi eai se ribalolo , na nuaboeadi eai se riba‐hemate .
19062006	Eaubada iabom earuagu i laubagibagiei ma monomonougu ; egu sunuma ede ia arinai .
19062007	Ia iabom egu we’utau eo egu abamauri ede , egu numa adiadidirina ; taba nige nuagu se heberuberu .
19062008	Egu abamauri eo egu abadudurai ede Eaubada iabom arinai , ia egu we’utau adiadidirina eo egu abahomo ede .
19062009	Egu dodogayao e , huia gamagamagari ia bena au sunumaei , nuamiu au hegoigabaedi ia matana eai . Eaubada ia eda aba ailogulogu ede .
19062010	Tatao dobidobidi isi doha eahua mo , tatao saesaedi isi doha ginauri borabora ; taba se nonoidi se mamara , mamohoi se mamara ariri abotai eahua .
19062011	Tabu baaea maisana u nuatui , eo tabu em sunuma u torelaei aiyahari arinai ; taba em gogo i helai , tabu nuam i lauei .
19062012	Ma’esega Eaubada ie riba , malabui ina ta ea ataiei : iaede ina , gigibori Eaubada iabom enana ,
19062013	gadosisi miatahitahina ede oabom arim eai , Guiau e , eo tau ena paipaisoa arinai abo oa u hemaisa .
19063001	Eaubada e , oa egu Eaubada ede , eau ea eo’o’eo’oim , earuagu i gadomaguem ; taugu maudoina i gadohiem , gonogonoana doha oea esau nige goilana , i pitari ariri eo i amnabaaea .
19063002	
19063003	Doha em abamia tabuna eai ea itamo , em gigibori eo em namanamari ea itadio .
19063004	Paana oa em gadosisi miatahitahina i sae ariri abotai mauri , eau sopagu eai abo ea hedebasaem .
19063005	Egu mauri asubenana lohana eai abo ea ribatausaei , eau nimagu abo ea lauisinidi , eo oa esam eai abo ea aiaiboda .
19063006	Earuagu i mata’asi , gonogonoana doha siada aroarodi eo momona ea aiaini , eo awagu i hedebasaem ma kodegu , sopagu eai ,
19063007	huiana eai wa egu abaeno eai ea nuanuatuim , maiona silasilawana eai ea nuanuatuim ,
19063008	paana oa agu sagu ede , eo oa mabem loguloguna eai abo ea wana ma nuawoiwoinagu .
19063009	Earuagu i patudidini arim eai , oa nima tutum i abiisinigu .
19063010	Na aidobu se aipate egu mauri se hebaaea abo se dobi tano boeana eai ;
19063011	abo se moselaedi elepa gigiborina eai , abo se hemala suisui nuura adi aiai .
19063012	na wasawasa abo Eaubada arinai i nuawoiwoina , isi gamagaridi ia debana eai se riba aigora , abo se kode lamposi ; na tatao borabora awadi abo se gududi .
19065001	Eaubada e , i lolo oa se hedebasaem Siona eai , oa arim eai hinage abo riba aigora se hemamohoiedi ,
19065002	
19065003	Oa uura tau ataiena ! Oa arim eai tatao gamagaridi abo se laoma ,
19065004	baaea giruna debana eai . Ena ema awayagara se saetawatawaimai , oa u ribagigiridi .
19065005	Aisega tau oa u abihineri , u woeaieama em numa tabuna gegesina eai , ia i kode ariri ! Em abamia ena lolo i hegonoahimai , oa em dubu tabuna !
19065006	Laulau matamatausidi aridi eai oa u lebohaimai ema abamauri Eaubadana e , tanoubu sigasigadi gamagaridi edi abasunuma ede oa arim eai , gabogabo sigasigadi hinage .
19065007	Oa em adidiri eai oea tupidi u hetubudi , oa gigibori ue lui ;
19065008	gabogabo ena dagugu u hemonou , butubutu dagudaguguna ; tatao hinage edi hetalagegagega ;
19065009	arinai isi tanoubu sigasigadi eai se mia em heiheinoi ta se matausiedi ; mahana ena aba dalasae eanuadi eo mahana ena aba dui eanuadi se wowo ma kodedi .
19065010	Tanoubu u nuatui eo nabu u hetaru , eo u hemasuri aririei ; Eaubada ena saga goila eai i monau , edi tuma u mosedi , paana oa u abinonohayao wa :
19065011	Oea se giari nonohaidi adi goila u mosedi , padipadi u hesabusabu , nabu arinai tano u hebiga , eo ginauri ini’inidi u helolodi .
19065012	Borimai huiana eai oea u hemasuri lolo aririei , em abalau gamagaridi eai masuri i lai ariri .
19065013	Barabara eai hinage nabu ie taru , oea tupidi se kode lamposi .
19065014	Oea abaaibai hinage mamoe eawoidi se hemonau , gonu hinage tuma arinai se hepasauioidi , se wowo eo se wanagogo kode debana eai !
19067001	Eaubada taba i ainauiaida eo i heloloda eo matana marana i hesina potada eai —
19067002	
19067003	oa em dobila tanoubu eai ta bena se ata , eo em abihemauri gigiborina eanua gamagaridi taumiaidi boeadi eai .
19067004	Eaubada e , tanoubu tataodi taba oa se hedebasaem , tanoubu tataodi gamagaridi taba se hedebasaem !
19067005	Eanua udoi udoi taumiaidi taba se kode , se wana ma kodedi , paana tanoubu tataodi duduraina eai oa u heduduraidi , tanoubu eanuadi udoi udoi taumiaidi oa abo u woeaidi .
19067006	Eaubada e , tanoubu tataodi taba oa se hedebasaem , tanoubu tataodi gamagaridi taba se hedebasaem !
19067007	Tano aiaina i tubuo ; Eaubada , ita eda Eaubada , i helolodao .
19067008	Eaubada i helolodao ; tanoubu sigana gamagamagaridi ia abo se heasisiei !
19071001	GUIAU e , abo ea ailogulogu oa arim eai ; taba nige se hetaumaeamaeagu , nige ariariri !
19071002	Em laulau dudurai debana eai bena u saguhaigu eo u hemaurigu ; beam eai u ataiegu , eo u hemaurigu !
19071003	Oa bena egu we’utau aba ailoguloguna , egu numa adiadidirina , egu aba mauri , paana oa egu we’utau ede , eo egu aba mia adiadidirina .
19071004	Egu Eaubada e , u lebohaigu tau baaea nimana eai , tau laulau gewagewa , eo tau manamanabara nimadi eai .
19071005	Paana ede oa , Guiau e , oa egu sunuma ede , egu aba awamamohoi , ma hewarigu i laoma e wauta .
19071006	Ea duihasari oa arim eai egu huia labasi eai i laoma e ina wauta , sinagu bogana eai oa u abihaigu . Egu hedebasae ede oa enam huia gamagamagari .
19071007	Ea hemala tatao edi aba no’o ; na oa egu aba homo adiadidirina ede .
19071008	Aihelahuim awagu i hemonau huia gamagari , eo em namanamari hinage asubena lohaloha .
19071009	Egu huia tautaubada eai tabu u abigabaegu , ena egu adidiri i dobidobi tabu u nuagabaegu .
19071010	Paana agu waiunu se ribaribaegu , isi se itasipoigu , se oiribagogo ,
19071011	si ene , “ Eaubada tau ta i lausuaraei , ta henauwatai ta toai , paana nige doga esau bena i saguhai . ”
19071012	Eaubada e , tabu u lausuara aririegu ; egu Eaubada e , u heurama u saguigu !
19071013	Isi tau hegirugu bena se hetaumaeamaeadi eo se hetauyamuidi ; isuewa eo taumaeamaea bena i buburidi , isi se aipate se hebaaeagu wa .
19071014	Na eau egu sunuma abo i otahai huia gamagamagari , oa hinage abo ea hedebasae aririem .
19071015	Awagu eai em abidudurai abo ea ribaribaei , em abihemauri laulaudi asubena gamagamagari , paana se gamagari ariri , nige gonoana ea hasiridi .
19071016	Guiau EAUBADA ena paipaisoa gigigigiboridi abo ea wasawasaedi ; oa oabom em laulau dudurai abo ea hedebasaei .
19071017	Eaubada e , egu hewari huiana eai oa u heaheatagu , i laoma e wauta em laulau gigigigiboridi ea wasaduaiedi .
19071018	Arinai egu huia tautaubada eo egu huia uruhou eai , Eaubada e , tabu u abigabaegu , i lau e em adidiri ea wasaduaiei isimurita gamagari aridi eai . Em gigibori
19071019	eo em laulau dudurai , Eaubada e , se sae e galewa ewana eai . Oa em paipaisoa se lai ariri , Eaubada e , eai doha oa ?
19071020	Egu lauita lailaidi u hegamagari aririedi , na oa abo u hemauriuioigu ; tano boeana eai abo u abiisiniuioigu .
19071021	Heasisi enagu abo u helaiama , eo nuagu abo u hebigauioi .
19071022	Baubau arinai abo ea hedebasaem em laulau lolodi debadi eai , egu Eaubada e ; baubau eai abo ea aihelahuim ma wanagu , Isaraela edi Tabuna e .
19071023	Ma kodegu abo sopagu se wowo , oa aihelahuim abo ea wanaidi ; earuagu hinage , ia ede oa u unehai wa .
19071024	Em haisagusagu duduraina memenagu abo i ribaribaei asubena lohaloha , paana ede isi se eo’oigu bena se heamamnagu wa , isi se hetaumaeamaeadi eo se isugaraedi .
19073001	Mamohoi Eaubada ena abi se lolo tatao laulau dudurai aridi eai , tau nua’aa’aa aridi eai hinage .
19073002	Na eau mo begana abo aegu se alabesibesi , aegu hanahanau abo se utusagigi .
19073003	Paana ede tau nuasaesae ea aiaromagigiriedi , huiana wa tau laulau gewagewa ena gogo ea i’ita .
19073004	Paana isi nige begana amamna se hearo ; se amna lolo mo eo se tubu lolo .
19073005	Isi nige se ai’iwala doha tatao headi ; pidipidiri nige se hearo doha tatao headi .
19073006	Arinai nuasaesae i hemala adi gadogado ; manamanabara i buburidi doha lulu .
19073007	Se tubu lolo ariri arinai matadi se pou , nuatu eauyaule nuadi se hemonau boriboriridi .
19073008	Se riba alaliuliuwa , eo se ribakarapi ; tatao se riba hematausidi ma nuasaesaedi .
19073009	Awadi eai galewa se hewaiunuei , eo se ribahetausaeuioidi tanoubu boeana eai .
19073010	Arinai tatao se sinibui eo se ribatausaedi ; edi ponori hinage nige se italobaidi .
19073011	Eo si ene , “ Mamohoi , Eaubada i nuatui ? Saesae Aririna abina ie ata , e nige’e ? ”
19073012	Mamohoi , tatao baabaaeadi ede ina ; huia gamagari taba nige saha se deha , edi gogo mo se helahelai .
19073013	Nuagu ea hea’a gaibui , eo nimagu ea deuridi gaibui laulau dudurai boeana eai :
19073014	Paana asubena lohaloha eai pidipidiri mo ea hearodi , eo maratomtom gamagari maisa mo ea abidi .
19073015	Taba ea ene , “ Doha ina abo ea riba ” , am isimurita abo ea woeaponoridi .
19073016	Na ena ea aipate ina ginauri ta ea nuatulobai , i heamnabaaea aririegu ,
19073017	i lau e ea awasaei Eaubada ena aba mia tabuna eai ; abotai adi sigana ea italobai .
19073018	Mamohoi tupo sagisagigi eai oa u hetorodi ; abo u heguridi mate arinai .
19073019	Maesega se hebaaea heohidi , matausi lailai arinai se ueagabaedi !
19073020	Guiau e , isi doha enosuai mo , ena u enotoro , enosuai wa u isuewaei , ana ao doha tautau gaibu mo .
19073021	Huiana eai wa ea nuakarapi , eo nuagu i amamna ,
19073022	ea eauyaule eo ea supusupu , agu ao doha suisui manamanabarana oa matam eai .
19073023	Taiede huia gamagari eau gegesim eai ; nimatutugu u abididini .
19073024	Em nuatu sibasibana arinai u woeaigu , eo maraitom asubena abo u heawasaegu em namanamari eai .
19073025	Eai abo enagu galewa eai na oabom mo ? Tanoubu eai hinage nige saha ea henua na oabom mo .
19073026	Bulumagu eo nuagu se beruberu , na Eaubada nuagu ena aba adidiri eo egu gogo ede i lau e nige nosina .
19073027	Hedeomi , tatao ena se miasuaraem abo se mate , tatao wa se boraboraim abo se mate .
19073028	Na eau ea amna lolo ena ea hanahanau Eaubada gegesina eai ; Guiau EAUBADA ea abiyao egu aba ailogulogu , abo em paipaisoa gamagaridi ea wasaduaiedi .
19080001	Isaraela taumiataunina e , u ataatai , oa Iosepa u woeai doha mamoe eawoina ! Oa ue bawa serubim potadi eai , maram u hesinalaei
19080002	
19080003	Eparanaime , Beniamina eo Manase eai ! Em gigibori u healabalebalelem eo u laoma u hemaurimai !
19080004	Eaubada e , u hetorouioimai ; matam u hesina potamai eai arinai abo ai mauri !
19080005	Tauiala moutuana edi GUIAU Eaubadana e , i lau e aitea huia abo u ouyalayala em tataoyao edi uura aridi eai ?
19080006	Matasulu mo u mosei adi aiai , matasulu hinage u henom aririedi .
19080007	U hetoromai helemai taumia edi aba alaliuliuwa ; ema waiunu hinage isibom se marumaruhiemai .
19080008	Tauiala moutuana Eaubadana e , u hetorouioimai ; matam u hesina potamai eai arinai abo ai mauri !
19080009	Aigupito eai vine esau oa u abiyama ; eanua tataodi u aihenauidi , eo vine wa u umai .
19080010	Tano enana u hea’a , lamna ie dobi , eo eanua maudoina i hemonau .
19080011	Loguloguna oea tupidi i heoputawaidi , eo maruwai lailaidi lagadi aridi eai hinage ;
19080012	lagadi i loloidi gabogabo eai , ini’inidi hinage se tulaedi Saga eai .
19080013	Paana saha ganana u oiheguri , to taubaeawa gamagaridi uauana se losi ?
19080014	Sarai nuura i hebaaea eo oea suisuidi gamagaridi arinai se aibai .
19080015	Tauiala moutuana Eaubadana e , u sinibuiuioma ! Galewa eai u itadobima , eo u ita ; vine ta oa u itawatai ,
19080016	lie wa oa nimatutum eai u umai wa .
19080017	Se gabuyao oeagi alaalasina arinai , se oiheguriyao ; i lolo am ao u hebaaea aridi eai , abo arinai se mate !
19080018	Na bena oa nimam u torelaei nimatutum tauna wa potana eai ; tau natuna oa u headidiri bena oabom enam !
19080019	Abotai taba nige ai sinibui ai lausuaraem ; Mauri u leama , abo oa esam eai ai aiaiboda !
19080020	Bena u hetorouioimai , tauiala moutuana edi GUIAU Eaubadana e ! matam u hesina potamai eai arinai abo ai mauri !
19084001	Oa em abamia , i lolo ariariri tauiala moutuana GUIAUNA e !
19084002	
19084003	Hedeomi , earuagu i gadohi ariri eo i amna baaea GUIAU ena abamia bena i lage arinai ; nuagu eo bulumagu se wana ma kodedi Eaubada maumaurina arinai .
19084004	Manu gagiridi edi abamia se lobaidi , manu hinage se abinoi , bena nanatudiyao edi abaota , oa em aitalasam hatahatana , tauiala moutuana GUIAUNA e , egu Wasawasa eo egu Eaubada .
19084005	Aidimo em numa eai se mia wa nuadi se kode , huia gamagari em aihelahui se wanaidi !
19084006	Tatao wa edi adidiri se abi oa arim eai abo se kode ariri , isi nuadi eai Siona ena dobila saesaedi !
19084007	Baka gonuna se luhudadai bena abo bunubunuasi dimona se saradi ; nabu ena huia sora , na ie taru abo ipu i hemonaudi .
19084008	Se adidiri , i lau e se adidiri ariri ; hari eaubada edi Eaubada abo i taumasaraha Siona eai .
19084009	Tauiala moutuana edi GUIAU Eaubadana e , egu uura u ataiei , beam bena i tasoe , Iakobo ena Eaubada e !
19084010	Eaubada e , ema guiau wasawasa bena u italau arinai ; bena u italau em heyausi tauna ana ao arinai !
19084011	Taba asubena esega mo em dubu eai ea mia , meta i loro ariri , abotai asubena tausani hari tupo eai . Ea henua ariri bena eau dobila tauitawataina mo egu Eaubada ena numa eai , abotai tau laulau gewagewa ena numalulu eai ea miamia .
19084012	Paana GUIAU Eaubada ia mahana eo opea ede , nualolo eo heasisi i mosei . Nige ginauri lolona esau GUIAU abo i nuahi , isi se mia dudurai aridi eai .
19084013	Tauiala moutuana GUIAUNA e , aitea tau i sunusunumaem ia tau kode mamohoina ede !
19085001	GUIAU , oa em eanua u abiloloei , Iakobo ena gogo u moseuioi arinai .
19085002	
19085003	Em tataoyao adi giru u ribagigiridio ; edi manamanabara gamagaridi u bubulitawaidio .
19085004	Em ouyalayala u helautom ; em nuayalayala gigigigiborina u torehesuara .
19085005	Ema mauri Eaubadana e , bena u helolouioimai , em nuabaaea arimai eai hinage bena u torehesuara !
19085006	Abo u ouyalayalaemai i lau e nige nosina ? Em ouyalayala abo u tubei i lau e isi gamagari aridi eai ?
19085007	Taba nige u hemauriuioimai , bena em tataoyao se kode arim eai ?
19085008	Em gadosisi miamiahaina bena u hemasaraha arimai eai , oe em mauri hinage bena abo u leama .
19085009	Hage ea ata’atai Eaubada GUIAU ena riba arinai , paana abo i ribabigabiga ena tataoyao aridi eai , ena tau miatahitahi tataodi aridi eai , isi wa se nuabui ia arinai .
19085010	Mamohoi ena abihemauri isi tau matausiena gamagaridi gegesidi eai , bena namanamari abo i otahai ita eda eanua eai .
19085011	Gadosisi miatahitahina eo ao mamohoina se haihailobai , laulau dudurai eo loni se haitalagadoi .
19085012	Ao mamohoi tano eai abo i inisae , laulau dudurai galewa eai abo i itadobi .
19085013	Mamohoi saha eo saha i lolo GUIAU abo i leama , abotai eda tano aiaina abo i helai .
19085014	Laulau dudurai ia abo se edabagunaei , eo ena dobila abo se sepa nonohai .
19090001	Guiau e , ema aba miatahitahi ede oabom mo , isidi gamagamagari eai .
19090002	Oea tupidi sora nige se tubu , tano eo tanoubu sora nige u hetubudi meta huiana ne i laoma e wauta , eo i lau e nige nosina oabom Eaubada .
19090003	Oa tatao u hebuidi se hemala tanouio ; u ene , “ Tatao nanatudiyao gamagarimiu e , au uio ! ”
19090004	Paana borimai tausani oa matam eai i lao’o doha lahi , hinage doha maiona esega silawana .
19090005	Tatao u ueahaidi ; isi doha enosuai mo , doha lei maratomtom eai i ini harihariu :
19090006	maratomtom eai ie ini eo ie tubu , maimailahi eai i wowoea eo ie mate .
19090007	Paana em ouyalayala eai ai tauyamui ; em nuabaaea i wuitawaimai .
19090008	Ema laulau gewagewadi wa oa matam eai u hemasarahadi , ema lausapuri eamuyamuidi oa matam marana eai u hemasarahadio .
19090009	Paana em nuabaaea eai ema asubena gamagaridi se laoma se lau , ema mauri borimaidi se lao’o doha eahua mo .
19090010	Ema mauri borimaidi ai hasiridi tatao haiona se mate saudoudoi , e ibai adidirimai eai taba tatao hasi se mate ai lobaidi , na ma amna baaeamai eo ma ai’iwalamai mo , nige baeaona se ohi na ai loi ai lau hari teha eai .
19090011	Em ouyalayala gigiborina eai abina ie ata , eo em ouyalayala eai i matausiei ?
19090012	Arinai ema asubena hasirina u heatamai abo nuasonoga ai lobai .
19090013	GUIAU e , u uioma ! Tabu u boneawa ! Em heaheari tataodi u nuatoataedi !
19090014	Maratomtom huiadi eai nuamai u hebigadi em gadosisi miatahitahina arinai , abo ema asubena gamagaridi eai ai nualolo eo ai kode .
19090015	Asubena gamagamagari u heamnabaaeamai wa , eo borimai gamagamagari hinage amamna aie ita wa gonogonoana abo hinage u hekodemai .
19090016	Bena am paisoa i masaraha em heaheari tataodi aridi eai ; em gigibori namanamarina nanatumyao aridi eai .
19090017	GUIAU ema Eaubada bena em nualolo i ota ai potamai eai , ema nimapaisoa hinage bena u helolodi , hedeomi , ema nimapaisoa oa bena u helolodi .
19091001	Aitea tau ia Saesae‐Aririna loguloguna eai i miahai , ia Gigibori‐Aririna loguloguna eai i miatahitahi ,
19091002	ia abo i ribalau GUIAU arinai i ene , “ Egu aba dago lolona eo egu aba mia adiadidirina , egu Eaubada , egu sunuma ea tore esegai arim eai . ”
19091003	Paana ia manu siposipona arinai abo i saguhaim , asiebo baaea eai hinage ;
19091004	goina eai abo i buburim , eo mabena ubuna eai em aba ailogulogu abo u lobai ; ena riba hemamohoiena opea gagirina eo opea lailaina ede .
19091005	Maiona hematausina ginaurina taba nige u matausiei , asubena eai pidu se tu hinage taba nige’e ,
19091006	baaea lailai masigiri eai ie sae ie dobi taba nige u matausiei , asubenalai eai sabom i hebaaea hinage taba nige’e .
19091007	Tausani gegesim eai abo se guri , tausani saudoudoi nimatutum eai hinage , na taba nige iwala wa i laoa oa gegesim eai .
19091008	Matam eai mo abo u aiaiewa laulau gewagewa tataodi edi maisa abo u ita .
19091009	Paana GUIAU ue abi em aba dago lolona , Saesae Aririna ia em abahomo
19091010	taba nige baaea esau i abi’itam , nige iwala saha i laoma oa em numalulu gegesina eai .
19091011	Paana ia ena aneru abo i hetorodi se itawataim , em dobila gamagaridi eai abo se ganaganaim .
19091012	Isi nimadi eai abo se abi’isinim , ata aem u hetupanei we’u eai .
19091013	Liona eo mota abo u ututawaidi , ae aroarom eai liona natuna eo mota abo u ututawaidi .
19091014	Paana ia gadosisi debana eai i patulaoma , eau abo ea lebohai ; abo ea ganaganai , paana esagu abina ie ata .
19091015	Ena i eogalaoma , abo ea heuio ; huia baaea boeana eai eau abo gegesina eai , eau abo ea lebohai , eo abo ea heasisiei .
19091016	Ena mauri abo ea heloha , eo abo ea henuabiga , egu abihemauri hinage eau abo ea heita .
19093001	GUIAU ia wasawasa ede ; ia ana tepo wasawasana eai se helui ; GUIAU se helui , adidirina ie lio . Mamohoi tanoubu i totoro adidiri ; taba nige se hemoimoiu .
19093002	Em terona mumuga eai se hetoro ; oa mumuga ariri eai u mia nige nosina .
19093003	GUIAU e , dibori utu’utu se dagudagugu , dibori utu’utu arinadi se lauisinidi , dibori utu’utu balamumudi se helaidi .
19093004	GUIAU ini puripurina eai i gigibori ariri , ena gigibori dibori utu’utudi gamagaridi dagugudi i saetawatawaidi , gabogabo bagodudi edi gigibori i saetawatawaidi !
19093005	Ena lauhesom ribadi isi ede mamohoi ariri ; hetabuena i patulau em numa tabuna arinai , GUIAU e , i lau e nige nosina .
19095001	Ehei , au laoma ta wana GUIAU arinai , ta wowo ma kodeda eda mauri we’utauna arinai !
19095002	Ta laoma ia matana eai ma lautoida , ta wowo ma kodeda ia arinai , ta wana ia ta aihelahui !
19095003	Paana ede GUIAU ia Eaubada lailaina , ia wasawasa lailai didigana , eaubada gamagaridi i saetawatawaidi .
19095004	Tanoubu ubu aririna ia nimana eai , oea tupidi saesaedi hinage ia enanayao ede ;
19095005	Gabogabo ede ia enana , paana ia i hetubu , ia nimana eai tano pitapitarina i ginauri .
19095006	Ehei , au laoma ta aihelahui eo ta tabaohui , ta turibono GUIAU matana eai , ia Tauhetubuda ede !
19095007	Paana ia eda Eaubada , ita ena ganaalo tataoda eo ia nimana mamoedi . I lolo wauta arinana au ataiei !
19095008	Tabu nuamiu au heoiuradi doha Meriba eai , doha asubena wa Masa eai , barabara eai ,
19095009	huiana wa tamamiuyao se lauitagu , eo se nohoigu , na agu paisoa se itayao .
19095010	Borimai tatao labui se mate isi ne ea hewaiunuedi , eo ea ene , “ Tatao ta nuadi eai se ponori ariri , eo egu laulau nige se nuatuidi . ”
19095011	Arinai ma ouyalayalagu ea riba aigora , bena taba nige se awasaei eau egu abaaiyawasi eai .
19096001	Omi wana harihariuna au wanai GUIAU arinai ! Tanoubu maudoina e , GUIAU arinai au wana !
19096002	Au wana GUIAU arinai , ia esana au ribatausaei ; ena abihemauri au hemasaraha , asubena to asubena .
19096003	Tanoubu tataodi gamagaridi matadi eai ena namanamari au ribahemasaraha , ena heiheinoi gigiboridi tatao gamagaridi matadi eai !
19096004	Paana GUIAU i lai ariri , ia aihelahuina hinage i lai ariri ; eaubada udoi udoi i saetawatawaidi .
19096005	Paana basileia udoi udoi edi eaubada ede oitau ; na GUIAU ia galewa tauginaurina .
19096006	Heasisi eo wasawasana ia matana eai , adidirina eo ao lolona ia ena abamia tabuna eai .
19096007	GUIAU enana au mosei , omi boga udoi udoi tataomiu e , GUIAU arinai namanamarina eo adidirina au mosei !
19096008	Namanamarina GUIAU esana enana au mosei ; ainauia au leama au awasaema ena dubu alona eai .
19096009	GUIAU au tabaohui , lulu tabudi au luidi , ia matana eai au tabutabubu , tanoubu tataomiu gamagarimiu e !
19096010	Eanua gamagaridi taumiaidi au heribadi au ene , “ GUIAU ia wasawasa ede ! Mamohoi tanoubu se hetoro , taba nige i moimoiu ; tanoubu tataodi ia i heduduraidi ma duduraina . ”
19096011	Galewa taba i kode , tanoubu taba i wowo , gabogabo taba i dagugu , eo taumiaina ,
19096012	oea taba i kode , eo taumiaina hinage ; abotai nuura oeagidi abo se wana ma kodedi ,
19096013	GUIAU matana eai , paana ia ede i laoma , paana ia ede i laoma tanoubu i hedudurai ma laulau duduraina , eo tatao wa ma ao mamohoina .
19100001	Tanoubu tataomiu gamagarimiu e , kode daguguna au ginauri GUIAU arinai !
19100002	GUIAU au heayaiyei ma kodekodemiu , au laoma ia matana eai ma wanamiu !
19100003	Omi abo au nuatui , GUIAU ia Eaubada . Ia i ginaurida , ita ia enana ; ita ia ena tataoyao , eo ita ia ena heaheai mamoena .
19100004	Au lulau ena dobila eai ma lautoimiu , au lulau ena dubu alona eai ma hedebasaemiu ! Ia au lautoiei , ia esana au ribatausaei !
19100005	Paana GUIAU i lolo , ena gadosisi miatahitahina i ota esegai i lau e nige nosina , eo ena riba hemamohoiena i lau e hari isi to hari isi .
19103001	Earuagu e , GUIAU u ribatausaei ; nuagu maudoina e , ia esana tabuna u ribatausaei .
19103002	Earuagu e , GUIAU u ribatausaei , eo ena ainauia gamagaridi tabu u nuahuiedi :
19103003	ia em laulau gewagewadi gamagaridi ie ribagigiridi , ia em iwala gamagaridi i helolodi ,
19103004	em mauri ia mate Duhana eai i unehai , ia urum i heou gadosisi miatahitahina eo nuatoatoa arinai ,
19103005	ia ginauri lolodi eai awam i hemonau i lau e em mauri sigana eai , arinai taum ena adidiri i heharihariu doha magesubu .
19103006	GUIAU abiabi dudurai i hemasaraha , isi gamagaridi se heamamnadi aridi eai .
19103007	Ia ena dobila Mose i heata , ena paipaisoa hinage Isaraela tataodi gamagaridi i heatadi .
19103008	GUIAU ena nuatoatoa eo ena aiainauia ie lai , ena ouyalayala nige i abiheulai , ena gadosisi miatahitahina i helai mo ie lau .
19103009	Ia taba nige huia gamagari i dilaida , ena ouyalayala taba nige i ota huia gamagari .
19103010	Eda baaea maisadi nige i ledima , eo eda laulau gewagewadi hinage nige maisadi i ledima .
19103011	Paana ede doha galewa tanoubu i saetawatawa aririei , doha ede meta ena gadosisi miatahitahina laina , ia tauheasisiena enadi .
19103012	Lohana doha mahana ena abadalasae ie lau mahana ena abadui , lohana doha meta eda awayagara arida eai i abihesuaradi .
19103013	Doha hinage tamana nanatunayao i nuatoatoaedi , GUIAU tauheasisiena tataodi nei doha abo i nuatoatoaedi .
19103014	Paana edohana ena ginaginaurida ia abina i atao , i nuatuiyao ita doha tano muamuana .
19103015	Na tau ia ena mauri asubenadi doha lei , e doha oea liasidi i maumauriei :
19103016	paana mana ie toa ede i eohoei i lao’o , ena abaota wa nige i itauioi .
19103017	Na GUIAU ena godosisi miatahitahina mumuga ariri eai i laoma , otaotana i lau e nige nosina , ia tauheasisiena enadi , eo ena laulau dudurai isimuri to isimuri tataodi enadi ,
19103018	isi ena laugagaeo taunanabuena enadi , eo ena lauheata ribadi taunuanuatuidi , eo taupaisoaidi enadi .
19103019	GUIAU ena terona galewa eai i abinonohai , eo tanoubu maudoina boeana eai ia wasawasa ede .
19103020	GUIAU au ribatausaei , omi ena aneru e , omi emi adidiri i lai ariri , ia ena lauhesom au nanabuedi , ena riba daguguna hinage au ataataiei !
19103021	Ena tauiala tataomiu gamagarimiu e , galewa tehana eai , GUIAU au ribatausaei , ena heaheari tataomiu ena gadosisi au lauwatai , ia au ribatausaei !
19103022	GUIAU ena nima paisoa gamagarimiu e , omi ia au ribatausaei , eanua gamagaridi ia i tanuagaidi . Earuagu e , GUIAU u ribatausaei !
19104001	Earuagu e , GUIAU u ribatausaei ! GUIAU e , egu Eaubada , oa u lai ariri ! Heasisi eo wasawasana arinai se heluim ,
19104002	oa mara eai u bubuliuioim , doha lulu , galewa ue wese doha numalulu ,
19104003	oa em abamia ena tuaga u toredi goila potadi eai , ealoi u abidi em abageru , mana mabena potadi eai ue gerusae ,
19104004	oa mana u abidi em tauwasa , oeagi ala’alana eo balebalelemna em heaheari ede .
19104005	Tanoubu u hetoro ena du potadi eai , bena tabu se hemoiu i lau e nige nosina .
19104006	Gabogabo arinai u buburi doha ena lulu ; oea tupidi se salili goila gabotumna eai .
19104007	Em riba su’u arinai goila se dago ; em parere daguguna eai se loi .
19104008	Oea tupidi eai se dididioidi se didi dobi gonu eai i lau e se lage teha eai wa oa u abinonohai enadi .
19104009	Adi sigasiga ue tore , taba nige se hemuri , bena tabu huia esau tanoubu se hesalili .
19104010	Gonu eai goila bunubunuwasina u hesito seama , se didilau oea duaduaridi eai ,
19104011	se hemala nu’ura suisuidi gamagaridi edi aba nom , asini manamanabaradi gadodi se hebigadi .
19104012	Gegesidi eai maragaibu manudi edi abamia se abidi , oeagi lagadi boeadi eai se wana .
19104013	Em abamia ewa ariri eai oea tupidi adi goila u mosei , tanoubu ie sese am paisoa uauana arinai .
19104014	Lei u he’ini suisui adi , oea uauadi hinage bena tau i umaidi , bena tano eai aiai i abi ,
19104015	waina hinage abo tau nuana i hekode , eausi abo arinai ana ao i masaraha , falawa hinage abo tau nuana i headidiri .
19104016	GUIAU ena oeagi goila se henomaririedi , Lebanona ena tamonau ia i umaidi wa .
19104017	Lagadi eai manu se abinoi ; oeagi lailaidi eai hinage manu siari lohalohana ena noi i ginauri .
19104018	Oea tupidi saesaedi goti manamanabaradi edi abalau , we’u lailaidi sibini edi aba bawayamui ede .
19104019	Nawarai oa u ginauri abo borimai sorasoradi edi heiheinoi ; mahana iabom ena huia dui abina ie ata .
19104020	Masigiri u leama to i maiona , nu’ura suisuina gamagarina se dalapesama .
19104021	Liona nanatudiyao se dou adi aiai sabidi adi aiai wa bena se eo’o Eaubada nimana eai .
19104022	Mahana ena huia dalasae abo se uio , se ota edi duha eai .
19104023	Tau ie pesa ie lau ena aba paisoa eai , i paipaisoa i lau e i maimailahi .
19104024	GUIAU e , nimam ginauridi ta’i se gamagari ! Sonogam eai ginauri gamagaridi oa u hetubudi ; tanoubu i monau nimam ginauridi aridi eai .
19104025	Gabogabo kalau nei eai , ie lai eo i magaga , ginauri gamagaridi se hemonau , ginauri maumauridi , gagiridi eo lailaidi .
19104026	Waga hinage se adau se lau , ulaulasi hinage u ginarui abo nei eai i aiaihea .
19104027	Teina ginauri gamagaridi ta se italaowa arim eai , huia mamohoina eai aiai adi abo u mosedi .
19104028	Ena u mosei aridi eai , se abi se ai ; ena nimam u soe bogadi se sese ginauri lolodi aridi eai .
19104029	Ena am ao u toreamui se heunaboisaha ; ena eahuadi u abihaidi se mate , eo se uio tano muamuana arinai .
19104030	Taba Earuam u hetamarilaei , se maumauri ; tano ana ao u heharihariu .
19104031	GUIAU namanamarina bena i mia i lau e nige nosina ! GUIAU bena i kode ariri ena nima paisoa aridi eai ,
19104032	ia i italau tanoubu potana eai to tanoubu i tabutabubu , oea tupidi i abi’itadi to se asuasu !
19104033	Egu mauri asubenana maudoina eai , GUIAU abo arinai ea wana , ma maumaurigu Eaubada abo ea hedebasaei wana arinai .
19104034	Egu nuanuatu eai bena ia nuana ea helolo , paana ea nuawoiwoina GUIAU arinai .
19104035	Taba tatao baaeadi se helautomdi tanoubu eai ta , taba tatao manamanabaradi se mateohi ! Earuagu e , GUIAU u ribatausaei ! GUIAU u aihelahui !
19107001	GUIAU ta lautoiei , paana ia i lolo ; eo ena gadosisi miatahitahina i laulau i lau e nige nosina !
19107002	Isi GUIAU i unehaidi wa bena se ribahemasaraha , isi wa iwala eai i unehaidi ,
19107003	eo eanua udoi udoi eai i woeagogoidi , tupo mahana ena aba dalasae eai eo tupo mahana ena aba dui eai , tupo bauri eo tupo eawana eai .
19107004	Headi barabara eai se sae se dobi , nige eanua se lobai bena arinai se mia ;
19107005	se guriam eo se gadomagu , se nua beruberu ariri .
19107006	Abo se doulau GUIAU arinai edi piripiri eai , eo i saguhaidi edi amamna eai ;
19107007	dobila duduraina eai i woeaidi , i lau e eanua se lagelobai abo arinai se mia .
19107008	I lolo GUIAU se lautoiei ena gadosisi miatahitahina debana eai , ena abiabi lolo dumadumadi tatao nanatudiyao aridi eai !
19107009	Paana taugadomagu gadona i hebiga , eo tauguriam bogana i hesese ginauri lolodi aridi eai .
19107010	Tatao headi masigiri eo nuadubu boeana eai se babawa , tau‐tutugudu amamna eo auau poasi eai ,
19107011	paana Eaubada ena riba se oipiriedi , eo Saesae Aririna ena riba hesanapu se isuewaei .
19107012	Se nuadobidobi paisoa oiurana debana eai ; se guridobi na nige tausaguidi .
19107013	Abo se doulau GUIAU arinai edi piripiri eai , eo i hemauridi edi amamna eai ;
19107014	masigiri eai eo nuadubu eai ia i woeahaidi , eo edi auau ia i tomutusidi .
19107015	I lolo GUIAU se lautoiei ena gadosisi miatahitahina debana eai , ena abiabi lolo dumadumadi tatao nanatudiyao aridi eai !
19107016	Paana dobila gududi bronze i eatugorugorudi , gana poasi i tomutusilabuiedi .
19107017	Headi se asiebo , matapaana edi laulau awayagara , eo edi manamanabara debadi eai amamna se hearodi ;
19107018	aiai udoi udoi se nua’itaitaedi , eo mate dobilana guduna se hanahanaui .
19107019	Abo se doulau GUIAU arinai edi piripiri eai , eo i hemauridi edi amamna eai ;
19107020	ena riba i hetamarilaei to i helolodi , mate eai i abihemauridi .
19107021	I lolo GUIAU se lautoiei ena gadosisi miatahitahina debana eai , ena abiabi lolo dumadumadi tatao nanatudiyao aridi eai !
19107022	Abo hinage lautoi aitalasamdi se moselaedi , eo ena laulau se wasawasaedi ma wana kodedi !
19107023	Tatao headi waga eai se adau se lau gabogabo eai , adi paisoa se laelaei gabogabo lailai eai ;
19107024	GUIAU ena laulau se itadi , ena abiabi lolo dumadumadi gabotum eai .
19107025	Paana ia ena riba eai na mana baaea ie toa , gabogabo butubutuna i helaidi .
19107026	Se sae e galewa , abotai se dobiuio gabotum , piripiri ta debana eai edi nuaadidiri ie welo ;
19107027	se mataodeode , eo se utu’utu sagisagigi doha doga i nomeauyaure , eo nuadi se tupa .
19107028	Abo se doulau GUIAU arinai edi piripiri eai , eo i hemauridi edi amamna eai .
19107029	Abo mana baaea i hemotu eo gabogabo butubutudi se daumori .
19107030	Abotai se kode ariri paana i daumori , to ia i woealaedi edi abalo se henua wa arinai .
19107031	I lolo GUIAU se lautoiei ena gadosisi miatahitahina debana eai , ena abiabi lolo dumadumadi tatao nanatudiyao aridi eai !
19107032	I lolo abo tatao edi oigogo eai ia se wasawasaei , babada edi oigogo eai hinage bena se hedebasaei .
19107033	Sagasaga i abiitadi se guma doha barabara , goila bunubunuwasina i hemala tano pitapitarina ,
19107034	oea masurina i abiita abo i hemala ariarita barabarana , taumiaina edi baaea debadi eai .
19107035	Barabara i hebui i hemala goila ipuna , tano pitapitarina i hemala goila ena ababunubunuwasi .
19107036	Nei eai tauguriam i hemiadi , edi eanua se hetoro abo arinai se mia ;
19107037	edi oea se umaidi , vine hinage se umaidi , abotai se masuri lolo .
19107038	Ia ena aiainauia debana eai se helaiuioi ; edi suisui hinage taba nige gamagarina i gagiri .
19107039	Ena Eaubada ena tataoyao se saetawatawaidi , eo nuadi se beruberu , hewaiunu , iwala e nuadubu debadi eai ,
19107040	ena isuewa abo i hegoilaei wasawasa potadi eai eo i hetamaridi se laulau gaibu barabara nige dobiladi aridi eai ;
19107041	na gogogesagesa tauna i lauisini lauita boeana eai , eo nanatunayao i hegamagaridi doha mamoe eawoina .
19107042	Taududurai ie ita to nuana i lolo ; na laulau gewagewa tataodi nige ariarinadi .
19107043	Eai to eai i sonoga i lolo ginauridi ta i nuatudidinidi ; i lolo GUIAU ena gadosisi miatahitahina bena se nuanuatui .
19110001	GUIAU i ribalau egu guiau arinai i ene , “ Nimatutugu eai u bawa , i lau e am waiunuyao abo ea abidi se hemala aem ana bou . ”
19110002	Em gigibori tuena Siona eai GUIAU i hetamarilaei . Am waiunuyao boeadi eai oa abo tanuaga !
19110003	Em tataoyao abo se moselaeiuiodi ma kodedi asubenana eai wa arinai em tauiala u woeaidi oea tupidi tabudi potadi eai . Maratomtom begana eai em isihariu doha wabumari abo se laoa arim eai .
19110004	GUIAU i riba aigora , eo taba nige nuana i bui , “ Oa kohena ede , i lau e nige nosina , Melekisadeka dobilana u miawatai . ”
19110005	Guiau ia nimatutum eai ; wasawasa abo i hetatagorigoridi ena ouyalayala asubenana eai .
19110006	Eanua taumiaidi abo i heduduraidi , tatao sinaredi eanuadi abo se hemonaudi ; babada abo i eatugorigoridi tanoubu maudoina potana eai .
19110007	Saga gagirina dobila gegesina eai abo arinai i ainom ; abotai uruna abo i lauisini .
19115001	Nige ai enamai , GUIAU e , nige ai enamai , na oa esam namanamarina enana abo se moselaei , em gadosisi miatahitahina debana eai , eo em riba hemamohoiena debana eai hinage !
19115002	Paana saha abo etene si ene , “ Edi Eaubada ede haedi ? ”
19115003	Ema Eaubada ia galewa eai ; saha eo saha i henua meta mo i ginauridi .
19115004	Isi edi oitau silver eo gold aridi eai se ginauridi , tau nimana ginaurina .
19115005	Isi awadi , na nige se ribariba ; isi matadi , na nige se itaita .
19115006	Isi beadi , na nige saha se ataiei ; isi isudi , na nige se panei .
19115007	Isi nimadi , na nige se abi’ita ; aedi hinage na nige se laulau ; eo gadoliedi eai nige begana dagugudi .
19115008	Tatao tauginauridi wa gonogonoana doha isi gamagaridi hinage eai to eai edi sunuma se torelaei aridi eai ,
19115009	Isaraela e , GUIAU au sunumaei ! Ia isi adi sagu eo edi opea ede .
19115010	Arona numana e , emi sunuma au tore esegai GUIAU arinai ! Ia isi adi sagu eo edi opea ede .
19115011	Omi eai to eai GUIAU au matausiei , GUIAU au sunumaei ! Ia isi adi sagu eo edi opea ede .
19115012	GUIAU ia i nuanuatuidaoieda ; ia abo i heloloda ; Isaraela numana abo i helolo ; Arona numana abo i helolo .
19115013	Isi GUIAU se matausiei abo i helolodi , dodoga gagiridi , eo dodoga lailaidi .
19115014	GUIAU emi gogo taba i helai , eo nanatumiuyao enadi hinage !
19115015	Taba GUIAU i helolomiu , ia galewa eo tanoubu tau ginauridi !
19115016	Galewa isi ede GUIAU ena galewa , na tanoubu mo i moseyao tatao nanatudiyao aridi eai .
19115017	Tau matematena ia taba nige GUIAU i hedebasaei , gonogonoana hinage isi gamagaridi wa se dobi monomonou eai :
19115018	Na ita GUIAU abo ta ribatausaei ina wauta eo i lau e nige nosina . GUIAU au hedebasaei !
19116001	GUIAU ea gadosisiei paana eau arinagu eo egu aiaiboda ia i ataiedio .
19116002	Ia i nonoha arinagu i ataiei , arinai egu mauri huiana maudoina eai abo ea eogalau arinai .
19116003	Mate ena sai’i se wese hetaiirigu , Hade amamnadi se abigu ; nuadubu eo amamna lailai ea hearodi .
19116004	Abotai ea eogalau GUIAU esana ea atai : “ GUIAU e , ea dousaewa , oa bena u abihemaurigu ! ”
19116005	Ia abilolo eo laulau dudurai GUIAUNA ede ; eda Eaubada ia nuatoatoa Eaubadana ede .
19116006	Tau dobidobina GUIAU i ganaganai ; huiana wa nuagu i dobidobi ia i lebohaigu .
19116007	Nuagu e , u uio em abaaiyawasi eai ; paana GUIAU i ainauia aririem .
19116008	Mate eai u saguhaigu , matasulugu matagu eai u sauhai , aegu u headidiridi bena tabu ea alabesibesi .
19116009	GUIAU matana eai abo ea laulau tatao maumauridi oeana eai .
19116010	Huiana wa ea ribaei ea ene , “ Egu lauita i lai ariri ” ; na egu sunuma mo nige ea abigabaei .
19116011	Egu heunaboisaha eai ea ene , “ Tatao gamagaridi se sunuma gaibu . ”
19116012	Saha abo ea moselaei GUIAU arinai ena abilolo gamagarina arigu eai maisana ?
19116013	Mauri biana abo ea abiisini eo ea eogalau GUIAU arinai esana ea atai ,
19116014	egu aigora abo ea hemamohoiedi GUIAU arinai , ena tataoyao gamagaridi matadi eai .
19116015	Ena taumiutahitahi tataodi edi mate i sae ariri GUIAU matana eai .
19116016	GUIAU e , eau em heaheari tauna esau , eau em heaheari tauna , em heaheari sinena natuna , egu auau u eairihaidio .
19116017	Lautoi aitalasamna abo ea moseleawa arim eai , eo abo ea eogalau GUIAU arinai esana ea atai .
19116018	Egu riba aigora abo ea hemamohoiedi GUIAU arinai , ena tataoyao gamagaridi matadi eai ,
19116019	GUIAU ena numa bau’ubau’una eai , boeam eai , Ierusalema e . GUIAU ta hedebasaei !
19119057	GUIAU ia egu gogo ede ; ea ribahesunuma oa em riba abo ea sogohididinidi .
19119058	Ma nua’esegagu em nualolo ea aiboda gadogadorai ; em riba hesunuma debana eai bena u nuatoatoaegu .
19119059	Ena em abiabi ea nuanuatuidi , aegu ea toreuoidi em riba tabudi aridi eai ;
19119060	Ea lelehi , taba nige ea bebeda em lauhesom bena ea nanabuedi .
19119061	Laulau gewagewa tauna siposipo mainana arinai bena i sipoigu , na em laugagaeo taba nige ea nuahuiei .
19119062	Bulinuana eai ea toro ea lautoiem , em hesanapu ribadi duduraidi debadi eai .
19119063	Tatao gamagaridi taumatausiem eau boeadi eai , isi gamagaridi em lauheata ribadi se nanabuedi .
19119064	GUIAU e , em gadosisi miatahitahina ta tanoubu i hemonauyao ; em laugagaeo bena u heatagu !
19119065	Em abi se lolo em heaheari tauna arinai , GUIAU e , oa em riba debana eai .
19119066	Sibasiba lolona eo sonoga oa bena u heatagu , paana em lauhesom ea awamamohoiedi .
19119067	Huiana eai wa sora nige amamna ea hearo , ea lausuaraem ; na ina huia ta em riba ea sogohididinidi .
19119068	Oa u lolo , em abiabi hinage se lolo ; em laugagaeo bena u heatagu .
19119069	Etene tataodi riba borabora arinai se hebaaeagu , na eau ma nuagu i ohihai em lauheata ribadi ea abididinidi .
19119070	Isi nuadi se potopoto doha momona , na eau em laugagaeo mo ea henua aririei .
19119071	Mamohoi i lolo ariri lauita ea hearodi ; debana eai em laugagaeo ea italobaidi .
19119072	Oa awam laugagaeona ie sae ariri arigu eai , abotai gold eo silver gamagamagaridi .
19119089	Em riba , GUIAU e , i otaesegai galewa eai , i lau e nige nosina .
19119090	Em riba u hemamohoiedi i lau e isi gamagaridi aridi eai ; tanoubu u hetoro‐tahitahi , eo i otaesegai .
19119091	Oa em riba debana eai wauta se totoro ; paana ginauri gamagaridi oa em heaheari ede .
19119092	Ena oa em laugagaeo nige i hekodegu , lauita boeana eai abo ea mate aririo .
19119093	Oa em lauheata ribadi taba nige ea nuahuiedi , paana isi debadi eai u abihemaurigu .
19119094	Eau oa enam , bena u abihemaurigu ; paana oa em lauheata ribadi ea eo’eo’oidi .
19119095	Laulau gewagewa tataodi se bagibagi bena se unuigu , na oa em riba tabudi mo ea nuanuatuidi .
19119096	Laulau lolo dumadumadi adi sigasiga ea itadio , na oa em lauhesom mo i magaga ariariri .
19119097	Em laugagaeo ea gadosisi aririei ! Asubena maudoina eai i hemala egu abanuanuatu .
19119098	Em lauhesom i hesonoga aririegu , agu waiunuyao nige doha , paana huia gamagari matagu eai i totoro .
19119099	Ea sibasiba ariri abotai egu taulauheata , paana em riba tabudi egu aba nuanuatu ede .
19119100	Ea sibasiba ariri abotai tautaubada , paana em lauheata ribadi ea nanabuedi .
19119101	Aegu ea abididinidi tabu dobila gegewarina ea lauwatai , em riba mo bena ea awaabiei .
19119102	Em ribahesanapu taba nige ea torehesuaradi , paana oa u heataguo .
19119103	Em riba se amna ariri awagu eai , se amna ariri awagu eai abotai amoamo !
19119104	Em lauheata ribadi aridi eai sibasiba ea lobai , to arinai dobila boraboradi gamagaridi ea hewaiunuedi .
19119105	Oa em riba ede eau aegu ena lamepa , eo egu dobila ena mara .
19119106	Eau ea aigorao , abo hinage ea hemamohoiei , em hesanapu ribadi duduraidi wa abo ea abiwataidi .
19119107	Egu amamna se gamagari ariri ; GUIAU e , oa u hemaurigu , gonogonoana doha ue ribaei wa !
19119108	GUIAU e , egu hedebasae aitalasamna awagu eai bena u abidi eo em hesanapu ribadi wa bena oa u heatagu .
19119109	Egu mauri eau nimagu eai huia gamagamagari , na oa em laugagaeo nige esau ea nuahuiei .
19119110	Laulau gewagewa tataodi sai’i se tore bena se sai’igu , na oa em lauheata ribadi taba nige ea lausuaraedi .
19119111	Oa em riba tabudi ea abidi doha egu gogo i lau e nige nosina ; mamohoi eau nuagu ena abakode meta .
19119112	Eau nuagu ea toreyao em lauhesom ribadi ea lauwataidi huia gamagari , i lau e sigana eai .
19119129	Oa em riba tabudi wa se sae ariri ; arinai earuagu i sogohididinidi .
19119130	Ena em riba se hemasaraha abo i hemaramai ; tau supusupu i hesibasiba .
19119131	Ma awadabarigu eawasigu ie ku’u , paana em lauhesom ribadi ea gadohiedi .
19119132	U sinibuima eo u nuatoatoaegu , paana oa kamanim isi esam tau gadosisiena aridi eai .
19119133	Aegu u headidiridi em ribahesunuma debana eai , abo taba nige laulau gewagewa esau i saetawatawaigu .
19119134	Tau ena hewahewaiunu arinai bena u unehaigu , abo em lauheata ribadi ea abiwataidi .
19119135	Am ao bena u hesina em heaheari potana eai , eo em laugagaeo u heatagu .
19119136	Eau matasulugu se dididi , mata paana tatao oa em laugagaeo nige se awaabiei .
19119137	GUIAU e , oa u dudurai , em hesanapu ribadi hinage se dudurai .
19119138	Em riba tabudi u hetorodi laulau dudurai debadi eai . eo em riba hinage u hemamohoiedi .
19119139	Egu nuaialayala i gabugu , paana agu waiunuyao em riba se nuahuiedi .
19119140	Oa em ribahesunuma wa se lauitayao , eo em heaheari tauna i gadosisiei .
19119141	Eau ea dobi ariri , to se isuewaegu , na oa em lauheata ribadi taba nige ea nuahuiedi .
19119142	Oa em laulau dudurai se dudurai i lau e nige nosina , eo oa em laugagaeo mamohoina ede .
19119143	Piripiri eo amamna se abigu , na oa em lauhesom ribadi egu nuawoiwoina ede .
19119144	Oa em riba tabudi se dudurai i lau e nige nosina ; sonoga bena oa u leama abo ea mauri .
19119153	Egu amamna bena u italau arinai eo bena u lebohaigu , paana oa em laugagaeo taba nige ea nuahuiei .
19119154	Enagu u toro , u ribasaguigu , eo u unehaigu , mauri u leama em ribahesunuma debana eai .
19119155	Laulau gewagewa tataodi taba nige se mauri , paana oa em laugagaeo nige se eo’o eo’oidi .
19119156	GUIAU e , oa em nuatoatoa i lai ariri ; em laulau dudurai debana eai bena mauri u leama .
19119157	Tauheamamnagu eo tauhewaiunuegu se gamagari , na oa em riba tabudi taba nige ea lausuaraedi .
19119158	Isi nige se awamamohoiem ea italau aridi eai ma nua’itaitagu ; paana oa em lauhesom nige se awamamohoiedi .
19119159	Abo u nuatui komakomani em lauheata ribadi ea gadosisiedi ! Egu mauri bena u ganaganai em gadosisi miatahitahina debana eai .
19119160	Em riba maudoina mamohoina ede ; eo em hesanapu ribadi duduraidi gamagaridi abo se otahai i lau e nige nosina .
19119169	GUIAU e , egu dou bena i saewa arim eai ; sonoga u leama gonogonoana doha u ribaei wa !
19119170	Egu awanori bena i saewa oa matam eai ; u saguhaigu gonogonoana doha u ribaei wa !
19119171	Eau sopagu eai ea hedebasaem paana oa em lauhesom ribadi u heatagu .
19119172	Eau memenagu eai em riba abo ea wanai , paana oa em lauhesom ribadi gamagaridi se dudurai .
19119173	Oa nimam taba i nonoha i saguigu , paana oa em lauheata ribadi wa ea abi hineridio .
19119174	GUIAU e , oa em abihemauri ea gadohi aririei , eo em laugagaeo egu aba kode ede .
19119175	Eau earuagu bena i mauri , abo ea hedebasaem , eo em hesanapu ribadi bena se saguigu .
19119176	Eau ea laupono doha mamoe ie gege wa ; em heaheari tauna taba u eo’oi , paana em lauhesom ribadi nige esau ea nuahuiei .
19120001	Egu nuadobidobi boeana eai ea eogalau GUIAU arinai , bena i heuioegu :
19120002	“ Sopa borabora aridi eai eo memena borabora aridi eai , GUIAU e , bena oa u saguhaigu . ”
19120003	Oa memena borabora e , saha abo se moseleawa arim eai , eo saha abo se ginauri enam ?
19120004	Tauiala ena pidu matamatana , ma oeagi alaalasina !
19120005	Ahani eau , paana Meseka eai ea miamia , Kedara ena numa lulu hinage boeadi eai ea miamia !
19120006	Ea abimatemate paana ea mia ariri isi boeadi eai labini se hewaiunuei .
